title: Massive USDT Transfer: $402 Million Moves to OKX, What Does It Mean?
body: BitcoinWorld Massive USDT Transfer: $402 Million Moves to OKX, What Does It Mean? In the dynamic world of cryptocurrency, where billions of dollars move across the globe every second, certain transactions stand out, grabbing the attention of traders, analysts, and enthusiasts alike. One such event recently sent ripples through the digital asset community: a monumental USDT transfer . Whale Alert, a renowned blockchain tracker, reported that an astounding 401,961,138 USDT, valued at approximately $402 million, was moved from an unknown wallet to the popular cryptocurrency exchange OKX. This single, massive USDT transfer raises numerous questions about market sentiment, potential strategies, and the ever-evolving landscape of digital finance. What Exactly Happened with This Enormous USDT Transfer? On a specific date, blockchain tracking service Whale Alert, known for monitoring large cryptocurrency movements, detected and reported a colossal USDT transfer . The details are as follows: Amount: 401,961,138 USDT Approximate Value: $402,000,000 Origin: An unknown wallet (address not publicly associated with a known entity or individual) Destination: OKX, one of the world‚Äôs leading cryptocurrency exchanges This kind of large-scale USDT transfer is not entirely uncommon in the crypto space, but its sheer size always warrants close examination. Stablecoins like USDT are crucial for liquidity and trading within the crypto ecosystem, often serving as a bridge between fiat currencies and volatile cryptocurrencies. A movement of this magnitude can signal various intentions, from institutional maneuvers to strategic trading plays, impacting market sentiment and potentially future price action. Understanding ‚ÄòUnknown Wallets‚Äô and Their Significance in a Large USDT Transfer When a transaction originates from an ‚Äòunknown wallet,‚Äô it often adds an element of mystery and speculation. But what exactly does ‚Äòunknown‚Äô signify in the context of a significant USDT transfer ? Privacy and Anonymity: Blockchain transactions are pseudonymous. While the wallet addresses are public, the identity of the owner behind those addresses is not inherently revealed. This privacy is a core tenet of cryptocurrency. Institutional Holdings: Many large ‚Äòunknown‚Äô wallets could belong to institutions, investment funds, or even large individual investors (often termed ‚Äòwhales‚Äô) who prefer to keep their holdings and activities private. Over-the-Counter (OTC) Desks: OTC desks facilitate large block trades for institutional clients, often moving funds between their own wallets and exchanges to fulfill orders without significantly impacting public order books. A large USDT transfer might be part of an OTC deal. Custodial Services: Some ‚Äòunknown‚Äô wallets might be associated with custodial services that hold funds on behalf of multiple clients, making it difficult to pinpoint the exact end-user or purpose of the transfer. The very nature of an ‚Äòunknown wallet‚Äô means we can only speculate on the exact motives behind such a large USDT transfer . However, the destination provides a clearer hint. Why OKX? Potential Implications of a Massive USDT Transfer to an Exchange The choice of destination, OKX, is a critical piece of the puzzle. OKX is a global cryptocurrency exchange offering a wide range of services, including spot trading, derivatives, and various financial products. A large USDT transfer to an exchange typically suggests one of several possibilities: Preparing for Large Purchases: The most common assumption is that the funds are being moved to the exchange to purchase other cryptocurrencies. A $402 million USDT deposit could be used to acquire significant amounts of Bitcoin, Ethereum, or other altcoins, potentially signaling bullish sentiment from the whale. Liquidity Provision: Large entities, including market makers, often deposit stablecoins onto exchanges to provide liquidity, facilitate trading, and earn fees from market operations. This helps ensure smooth price discovery and execution for other traders. Yield Farming or Staking: OKX, like many exchanges, offers various financial products such as yield farming, staking, and lending. The whale might be moving the USDT to participate in these programs to earn passive income. Rebalancing Portfolios: Large investors frequently rebalance their portfolios. This USDT transfer could be part of a broader strategy to adjust asset allocations, moving from an external wallet to the exchange for easier trading access. OTC Deal Fulfillment: While an OTC deal itself happens off-exchange, the final settlement or part of the funds might need to be moved to an exchange wallet to complete the transaction or distribute funds to various participants. Each of these scenarios carries different implications for the broader market. The movement of such a substantial amount of stablecoin can precede significant market activity. Decoding the Whale‚Äôs Intentions: What Could This Mean for the Market After a Huge USDT Transfer? While definitive answers are elusive, market observers often try to ‚Äòdecode‚Äô the intentions behind such large movements. A significant USDT transfer like this can be interpreted in several ways: Bullish Signal: If the whale intends to buy a large amount of Bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies, this influx of stablecoin liquidity could be seen as a bullish indicator, suggesting an expectation of rising prices. Bearish Signal (Less Likely for USDT Inflow): While less common for stablecoin inflows, if the USDT is intended for withdrawal after converting other assets to stablecoins, it could indicate a move to de-risk or take profits. However, direct USDT inflow to an exchange is typically associated with buying power. Market Stability: The presence of large amounts of stablecoin on exchanges can also contribute to market stability by providing deep liquidity, which can absorb large buy or sell orders without causing extreme price volatility. Institutional Interest: The size of this USDT transfer strongly suggests institutional involvement. Growing institutional participation is often viewed positively, as it brings more capital and maturity to the market. It is crucial to remember that one large transaction does not necessarily dictate the entire market‚Äôs direction. However, it provides a valuable data point for analysis. Navigating the Waters: How to Interpret Such Events and Their Impact on a USDT Transfer For everyday crypto participants, understanding these large transactions is key to navigating the market. Here are some actionable insights: Monitor Whale Alerts: Services like Whale Alert provide transparency into significant on-chain movements. Keeping an eye on these reports can offer early indications of potential market shifts. Context is Key: Don‚Äôt react solely to one transaction. Always consider it within the broader market context ‚Äì overall market sentiment, news events, technical analysis, and macroeconomic factors. Stablecoin Inflows vs. Outflows: Generally, large stablecoin inflows to exchanges suggest an intent to buy, while large stablecoin outflows might indicate funds being moved off-exchange for cold storage or OTC deals. Diversify Your Information Sources: Rely on multiple reputable sources for your crypto news and analysis to get a well-rounded view. Practice Risk Management: Regardless of whale movements, always trade responsibly and never invest more than you can afford to lose. Large transactions can cause short-term volatility. This particular USDT transfer serves as a reminder of the powerful forces at play in the crypto market. The Broader Impact on USDT and Stablecoins Beyond the immediate implications for OKX and potential market movements, this massive USDT transfer also reinforces the critical role of stablecoins like Tether (USDT) in the cryptocurrency ecosystem. USDT remains the largest stablecoin by market capitalization, serving as a vital trading pair and a safe haven during periods of volatility. The ability to seamlessly move hundreds of millions of dollars in USDT across the blockchain highlights its utility and liquidity. Such large transfers underscore the trust and reliance placed on stablecoins for facilitating significant value transfers efficiently and cost-effectively, underpinning the vast majority of crypto trading volume globally. Conclusion: The Enduring Mystery of the Massive USDT Transfer The recent USDT transfer of over $400 million from an unknown wallet to OKX is a compelling example of the powerful, yet often opaque, movements that characterize the cryptocurrency market. While the exact motives of the ‚Äòwhale‚Äô remain a mystery, the transaction underscores the growing institutional interest, the critical role of stablecoins, and the deep liquidity available on major exchanges. Such events serve as important data points for market analysis, offering glimpses into potential shifts in sentiment or strategic plays by major players. As the crypto market continues to mature, monitoring these large transactions will remain a vital practice for anyone looking to understand its intricate dynamics and potential future directions. The world of crypto is always buzzing with activity, and a USDT transfer of this magnitude certainly adds to the intrigue. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is a ‚Äòwhale‚Äô in cryptocurrency? In cryptocurrency, a ‚Äòwhale‚Äô refers to an individual or entity that holds a very large amount of a particular cryptocurrency. These large holders have the potential to significantly influence market prices due to the size of their holdings and transactions. Why are large USDT transfers significant? Large USDT transfers are significant because USDT is a stablecoin pegged to the US dollar, often used as a proxy for fiat currency within the crypto ecosystem. Massive movements of USDT to or from exchanges can indicate intentions to buy or sell other cryptocurrencies, signal institutional activity, or affect market liquidity, potentially influencing price trends. Does a large USDT transfer always mean a market pump or dump? Not necessarily. While a large USDT inflow to an exchange is often interpreted as a bullish signal (preparation to buy other assets), and an outflow as potentially bearish (moving funds off-exchange), these are not guaranteed outcomes. Such transfers could also be for liquidity provision, rebalancing portfolios, OTC deal settlements, or participation in staking/lending programs. How can I track large crypto transactions like this USDT transfer? You can track large crypto transactions using blockchain explorers and services like Whale Alert. These platforms monitor public blockchain addresses and report significant movements, often providing details on the amount, origin, destination, and approximate value of the transaction. What is OKX and why would a whale choose it for a large USDT transfer? OKX is a leading global cryptocurrency exchange offering a wide range of trading services, including spot, futures, options, and various DeFi products. Whales might choose OKX for a large USDT transfer due to its deep liquidity, robust infrastructure, wide selection of trading pairs, and institutional-grade services, which are crucial for executing large orders efficiently. Did you find this analysis of the recent massive USDT transfer insightful? title: Solo Bitcoin Mining Miracle: Miner Strikes Gold with 3.16 BTC Block Reward
body: BitcoinWorld Solo Bitcoin Mining Miracle: Miner Strikes Gold with 3.16 BTC Block Reward Imagine hitting the jackpot against astronomical odds, not in a lottery, but in the digital realm of cryptocurrency. This is precisely what happened recently when a dedicated individual achieved the near-impossible: a solo miner successfully mined a Bitcoin (BTC) block, securing a staggering 3.16 BTC. This extraordinary feat, recorded at block height 907,465 on July 28, according to blockchain explorer Mempool, resulted in a reward valued at approximately $377,500. It‚Äôs a moment that highlights the sheer unpredictability and immense potential rewards within the world of Solo Bitcoin Mining , inspiring countless enthusiasts and demonstrating that sometimes, against all odds, a single miner can indeed strike digital gold. What Exactly is Solo Bitcoin Mining? In the vast and competitive landscape of cryptocurrency, Solo Bitcoin Mining stands out as a high-stakes endeavor. Unlike most miners who join large mining pools to combine their computational power and share rewards, a solo miner operates independently. This means they dedicate their entire hash rate ‚Äì the total computational power used to mine ‚Äì to finding a block on their own. If successful, they keep the entire block reward, which currently includes the block subsidy (6.25 BTC, though this particular miner received a smaller amount due to transaction fees being part of the 3.16 BTC total reward) plus any transaction fees associated with the block. The concept is simple: you‚Äôre trying to solve a complex cryptographic puzzle before anyone else in the world. The reality, however, is anything but. The difficulty of mining Bitcoin blocks adjusts roughly every two weeks, ensuring that new blocks are found approximately every 10 minutes. As more miners join the network, the difficulty increases, making it exponentially harder for any single entity to find a block. How Does Bitcoin Mining Work and Why is it So Difficult? At its core, Bitcoin mining is the process of adding new transactions to the Bitcoin blockchain. Miners use powerful computers to solve a complex computational puzzle, which is essentially finding a hash (a string of numbers and letters) that is less than or equal to a target set by the network. This process is known as Proof-of-Work (PoW). Here‚Äôs a simplified breakdown: Transaction Verification: Miners gather unconfirmed transactions into a block. Puzzle Solving: They then try to find a ‚Äònonce‚Äô (a number used only once) that, when combined with the block‚Äôs data and hashed, produces a result below the network‚Äôs target difficulty. Block Discovery: The first miner to find this nonce broadcasts their solution to the network. Reward: If other nodes verify the solution, the block is added to the blockchain, and the successful miner receives the block reward (newly minted BTC) and transaction fees. The difficulty is immense because the network‚Äôs total hash rate is colossal. Global Bitcoin mining operations utilize specialized hardware called ASICs (Application-Specific Integrated Circuits) that perform trillions of calculations per second. For a solo miner, their individual hash rate is a minuscule fraction of the global total, making the probability of finding a block akin to winning a lottery where there are billions of tickets, and you only hold one. What are the Astronomical Odds Against a Solo Bitcoin Miner? The odds of a solo miner finding a block are incredibly slim, often described as lottery-like. To put it into perspective, consider the current network hash rate, which can be in the exahashes per second (EH/s). A single, high-end ASIC miner might contribute a few hundred terahashes per second (TH/s). An exahash is 1,000,000 terahashes. This means one miner‚Äôs contribution is a tiny drop in a massive ocean of computational power. The probability of a miner finding a block is directly proportional to their share of the total network hash rate. If a solo miner possesses, say, 0.0000001% of the total network hash rate, their chance of finding the next block is also 0.0000001%. This is why the news of a solo miner succeeding generates such buzz ‚Äì it‚Äôs a testament to incredible luck and persistence, highlighting the rare success stories in Solo Bitcoin Mining . Why Do Miners Still Attempt Solo Bitcoin Mining? Given the overwhelming odds, one might wonder why anyone would even bother with Solo Bitcoin Mining . The answer lies in the allure of the full block reward. While joining a mining pool offers more consistent, albeit smaller, payouts, a solo miner stands to gain the entire bounty. For this particular miner, that meant a reward of 3.16 BTC, which at the time was valued at a significant $377,500. This lump sum can be life-changing, whereas pooled mining typically distributes fractions of BTC daily or weekly. Beyond the financial incentive, some solo miners are driven by ideological reasons. They believe in the true decentralization of Bitcoin and prefer not to contribute to the concentration of hash power in large pools. By mining solo, they contribute directly to the network‚Äôs security and decentralization without intermediaries. Challenges and Risks of Solo Bitcoin Mining While the rewards can be massive, the challenges and risks associated with Solo Bitcoin Mining are equally substantial: High Upfront Costs: Acquiring powerful ASIC miners requires a significant initial investment. Electricity Consumption: Mining hardware consumes enormous amounts of electricity, leading to high operational costs that can quickly outweigh potential earnings if no block is found. Heat and Noise: Miners generate considerable heat and noise, requiring proper cooling and ventilation systems. Low Probability of Success: As discussed, the chances of finding a block are extremely low for individual miners, meaning extended periods (potentially years) with no payout. Hardware Failure: Constant operation can lead to hardware wear and tear or failure, requiring repairs or replacements. Market Volatility: The value of Bitcoin can fluctuate wildly, impacting the real-world value of any potential block reward. Many aspiring solo miners often give up due to these challenges, making the recent success story even more remarkable. The Unforgettable Solo Bitcoin Mining Success Story The miner in question, operating with an estimated hash rate of around 1 PH/s (petahash per second), managed to beat the odds that were literally one in a million. This particular event wasn‚Äôt an isolated incident, though it remains incredibly rare. Over the years, there have been a handful of similar stories, often involving miners with surprisingly modest setups, which only adds to the mystique and appeal of Solo Bitcoin Mining . Such events serve as powerful reminders of Bitcoin‚Äôs decentralized nature and the ‚Äòpermissionless‚Äô aspect of its network. Anyone, anywhere, with the right equipment and a stroke of luck, can contribute to the network and potentially reap significant rewards. It‚Äôs a testament to the robust design of Bitcoin‚Äôs protocol that even with massive mining pools dominating the scene, individual efforts can still yield spectacular results. What Does This Mean for the Future of Bitcoin Mining? While this solo success story is inspiring, it doesn‚Äôt fundamentally change the economics or practicality of Bitcoin mining for the average individual. Mining pools will continue to be the dominant force, offering consistent, albeit smaller, returns. However, these rare events keep the dream alive for those who are willing to take on immense risk for the chance of an extraordinary payout. They also serve as a vital psychological boost for the Bitcoin community, reinforcing the idea that the network remains open and accessible, not just to large corporations, but to dedicated individuals as well. It underscores Bitcoin‚Äôs resilience and its commitment to a system where participation is open to all, and success, however improbable, is always a possibility. This unique aspect ensures that the narrative of Bitcoin continues to be one of innovation, opportunity, and sometimes, pure digital serendipity. Conclusion: The Enduring Allure of Solo Bitcoin Mining The incredible achievement of a solo miner securing a 3.16 BTC block reward is more than just a news headline; it‚Äôs a powerful narrative about ambition, perseverance, and the sheer luck that sometimes plays a role in the high-stakes world of cryptocurrency. It serves as a vivid illustration of the ‚Äòdigital gold rush‚Äô that Bitcoin mining represents, where immense computational power meets a lottery-like chance of success. While Solo Bitcoin Mining remains an endeavor with formidable challenges and extremely low probabilities, this story reminds us that against all odds, extraordinary feats are indeed possible. It fuels the dreams of countless individuals and reinforces the decentralized ethos at the heart of the Bitcoin network. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) About Solo Bitcoin Mining Here are some common questions about this fascinating aspect of the Bitcoin network: Q1: Is Solo Bitcoin Mining profitable for most people? A1: No, for most individuals, solo Bitcoin mining is highly unlikely to be profitable due to the extremely high network difficulty, significant hardware costs, and substantial electricity consumption. The chances of finding a block are astronomically low. Q2: What is the main difference between solo mining and pooled mining? A2: Solo mining involves an individual miner attempting to find a block entirely on their own, keeping the full reward if successful. Pooled mining involves many miners combining their computational power and sharing rewards proportionally to their contribution, leading to more consistent but smaller payouts. Q3: How much Bitcoin does a miner get for finding a block? A3: As of the most recent halving, the block subsidy is 6.25 BTC. Miners also receive transaction fees from all transactions included in the block. The 3.16 BTC in this story likely represents the total amount including transaction fees for that specific block. Q4: What equipment is needed for Solo Bitcoin Mining? A4: To even have a remote chance, you would need powerful Application-Specific Integrated Circuit (ASIC) miners, which are specifically designed for Bitcoin mining. These are expensive, consume a lot of electricity, and require proper cooling and ventilation. Q5: Are there other cryptocurrencies that are easier to solo mine? A5: Yes, some smaller or newer cryptocurrencies with lower network hash rates can be easier to solo mine. However, these often come with higher price volatility and lower potential rewards compared to Bitcoin. Q6: How does this solo mining success impact Bitcoin‚Äôs security? A6: Each successful block mined, whether by a solo miner or a pool, adds to the security of the Bitcoin network by verifying transactions and extending the blockchain. Solo successes like this highlight the decentralized nature and robustness of the network. Share this incredible story of a solo miner defying the odds! If this tale of digital fortune has inspired you, consider sharing it with your friends, family, and fellow crypto enthusiasts on social media. Let‚Äôs spread the word about the amazing possibilities (and extreme challenges) of Solo Bitcoin Mining ! To learn more about the latest explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin‚Äôs institutional adoption. This post Solo Bitcoin Mining Miracle: Miner Strikes Gold with 3.16 BTC Block Reward first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

body: A fresh burst of XRP news has traders watching the XRP price again as it cools near support after a hot July run. Derivatives data shows open interest near cycle highs and whale wallets absorbing supply, which supports a rebound case if the XRP price holds the $3.00 to $3.10 area. If buyers reclaim $3.66 and weekly volume expands, models point to $4.50 to $5.00 later in the year. Any dip back to $2.60 would be the line where bulls need to defend the broader uptrend. With $17.4 million raised and 571 million tokens sold at $0.0876, RTX is now on watchlists as a payments‚Äëfirst altcoin that could scale beyond crypto circles. Audited by CertiK for added trust Utility‚Äëfirst design for real transaction demand Expanding payout corridors to reach more markets Deflationary token mechanics aimed at long‚Äëterm holders Active roadmap with product milestones and partner pilots Community growth across X and Telegram with rising engagement What this mix could mean for the market If the XRP price base holds and pushes back toward $5, liquidity often spills over into newer themes. Pengu benefits when Solana volume is high, and Remittix benefits when investors look for payment tokens with real utility and clear roadmaps. XRP price action will set the tone, but the search for 50x names keeps leading traders to Pengu‚Äôs momentum and Remittix‚Äôs payment focus. title: 4 Things That Could Move Crypto Markets in The Week Ahead
body: Crypto markets have started the new week in the green, and the momentum could continue as trade tensions ease.¬†The big event for the week is the Federal Reserve meeting on July 30, when the latest interest rate decision will be made. Meanwhile, US President Trump has reached a deal with the European Union, which includes an agreement to open up trade at 0% tariff and for the EU to buy energy and automobiles from the US. This comes just days after a deal was reached with Japan, and US stock futures have reacted positively this Monday. Economic Events July 28 to August 1 Tuesday will see consumer confidence data released, which reflects how the public views the current state of the economy. There will also be some job opening reports released on Tuesday.¬†Wednesday is a busy day with the second-quarter GDP report released, reflecting economic growth over the period. The central bank‚Äôs two-day policy meeting will be in focus this week, especially due to President Trump‚Äôs persistent attacks on the Chair Jerome Powell. The Fed is expected to hold the borrowing rate steady in a target range of 4.25% to 4.50%. ‚ÄúWe expect Powell to repeat a patient, data-dependent policy outlook with flexibility, but he is unlikely to commit to cuts,‚Äù Prashant Newnaha, senior Asia-Pacific rates strategist at TD Securities, told Reuters. The Personal Consumption Expenditure (PCE) price index report is scheduled for release on Thursday. This is a major gauge for inflationary pressures and could impact investor sentiment. Key Events This Week: 1. CB Consumer Confidence data ‚Äì Tuesday 2. June JOLTs Job Opening data ‚Äì Tuesday 3. Q2 2025 GDP data ‚Äì Wednesday 4. Fed Meeting and Interest Rate Decision ‚Äì Wednesday 5. June PCE Inflation data ‚Äì Thursday 6. July Jobs Report ‚Äì Friday We have a‚Ä¶ ‚Äî The Kobeissi Letter (@KobeissiLetter) July 27, 2025 The August 1 deadline to raise tariffs is on Friday, and many countries have yet to come to the table to discuss deals.¬†Meanwhile, earnings from four of the ‚ÄòMagnificent 7‚Äô stocks ‚Äì Meta, Microsoft, Amazon, and Apple ‚Äì are eagerly awaited. Crypto Markets Moving Total crypto capitalization is at an all-time high, having topped $4 trillion again as the big two are moving. Bitcoin built on weekend momentum, reaching $119,754 during early trading in Asia on Monday morning. The asset has fully recovered from its Friday slump and is just 2.8% away from its all-time high. Ethereum is doing even better with a 3% daily gain to come just over $3,900 on Monday. The asset is at a seven-month high and has gained a whopping 60% over the past month, largely due to ETFs and corporate treasury demand. Other altcoins outperforming include Binance Coin (BNB), surging to an all-time high of $850, Bitcoin Cash (BCH), and Avalanche (AVAX). The post 4 Things That Could Move Crypto Markets in The Week Ahead appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Crypto Lender Divine Uses Iris-Scanning World ID to Disburse 30,000 Unsecured Loans
body: San Francisco-based crypto lender Divine Research is extending thousands of unsecured loans to borrowers across the globe, verified not through traditional IDs but with a scan of their eyes. The startup says it has issued around 30,000 short-term loans since December, the Financial Times reported Sunday. To identify borrowers, it uses World ID, the iris-scanning identity platform developed by OpenAI CEO Sam Altman‚Äôs crypto venture, Worldcoin. The loans, mostly under US$1,000, are paid out in USDC , a dollar-pegged stablecoin issued by Circle. The loans are aimed at underserved individuals, often in developing economies, who struggle to access credit through traditional banks. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre loaning to average folks like high-school teachers, fruit vendors‚Ä¶ basically anyone with access to the internet,‚Äù said Divine founder Diego Estevez. ‚ÄúThis is microfinance on steroids.‚Äù Crypto lenders dial up risk with ‚Äòmicrofinance on steroids‚Äô https://t.co/6GgzJZROtm ‚Äî Financial Times (@FT) July 27, 2025 Divine Pilots Lending Model in Inflation-Hit Argentina Each borrower must scan their iris through a World ID orb to verify their identity. The system is designed to prevent defaults by blocking users from taking multiple loans under different identities. Even so, Estevez admits that default rates on first-time loans hover around 40%. Fixed interest rates of 20% to 30%, along with reclaimable Worldcoin tokens, help offset these losses. Divine‚Äôs approach has been piloted in Argentina, where years of inflation have made access to stable-dollar credit particularly attractive. Estevez said most borrowers had little or no prior experience with crypto before joining the platform. Liquidity is provided by individual depositors, many of whom are drawn by the high yields. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve engineered the system such that after accounting for default rates and the [interest] rates on offer, providers will always make a profit,‚Äù he said. Unsecured Crypto Lending Returns After 2022 Collapse Divine‚Äôs rise comes as unsecured crypto lending begins to re-emerge, three years after the 2022 market crash that saw major lenders like Celsius and Genesis collapse. At the time, retail-funded lending platforms failed to return deposits as falling token prices triggered massive defaults. Celsius CEO Alex Mashinsky was later sentenced to 12 years in prison, while Genesis paid a $2b settlement to resolve investor fraud allegations. Divine‚Äôs peers are also testing the waters. A platform called 3Jane, backed by crypto venture firm Paradigm, is issuing uncollateralised USDC loans on Ethereum. While it requires proof of bank or crypto assets, it does not demand collateral. Defaulted loans are sold to US debt collectors. 3Jane is now developing AI-powered lending agents designed to follow debt terms automatically, potentially reducing risk. Unsecured Crypto Loans Gain Traction Despite Niche Status Although still a niche segment in the multibillion-dollar crypto lending market, unsecured loans are gaining attention amid growing investor appetite. Larger players like Coinbase and Tether continue to dominate collateralised lending. Meanwhile, Wall Street is entering the space cautiously, with firms like Cantor Fitzgerald launching bitcoin-backed financing arms. Divine‚Äôs model sets itself apart with its use of biometric verification and its focus on small, global borrowers. For now, the company is betting that a combination of eye scans, high interest rates and yield-hungry depositors can make unsecured crypto loans work, even in a market still haunted by its past. The post Crypto Lender Divine Uses Iris-Scanning World ID to Disburse 30,000 Unsecured Loans appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Solana Memecoins: Anatoly Yakovenko‚Äôs Blunt Critique of ‚ÄòDigital Slop‚Äô
body: BitcoinWorld Solana Memecoins: Anatoly Yakovenko‚Äôs Blunt Critique of ‚ÄòDigital Slop‚Äô The world of cryptocurrency is no stranger to bold statements, but few have resonated quite like the recent critique from Anatoly Yakovenko, co-founder of Solana. In a move that has sparked widespread debate, Yakovenko candidly labeled Solana memecoins and NFTs as ‚Äòdigital slop,‚Äô comparing them to the controversial loot boxes found in free-to-play mobile games. This provocative assessment challenges the very perception of value within the digital asset space, forcing us to ask uncomfortable questions about what truly drives growth and innovation in the blockchain ecosystem. The Controversial Truth About Solana Memecoins and NFTs: ‚ÄòDigital Slop‚Äô? Anatoly Yakovenko‚Äôs remarks, as reported by Cointelegraph, cut straight to the core of a persistent debate in the crypto community: what constitutes genuine value? His comparison of memecoins and NFTs to ‚Äòdigital slop‚Äô implies a lack of intrinsic worth, suggesting they exist primarily as speculative vehicles rather than tools for meaningful utility. He didn‚Äôt mince words, drawing a direct parallel to the ‚Äòloot box‚Äô mechanic ‚Äì a system often criticized for its addictive, gambling-like nature and its ability to generate significant revenue without necessarily offering substantial user benefit. Yakovenko‚Äôs perspective suggests that while these digital assets might be wildly popular and financially lucrative, their underlying purpose, or lack thereof, is concerning. It‚Äôs a stark reminder that not all digital assets are created equal, and some might be designed more for extraction than for contribution to a decentralized future. This blunt assessment from a leading figure in the blockchain space certainly gives pause for thought regarding the long-term sustainability and true innovation these assets bring. Are Solana Memecoins Truly Valueless? A Deeper Dive Despite his strong criticism, Yakovenko acknowledged a crucial point: Solana memecoins have undeniably played a significant role in the network‚Äôs recent surge in activity and visibility. This presents a fascinating paradox. How can something deemed ‚Äòdigital slop‚Äô simultaneously be a catalyst for growth? Yakovenko himself offered an analogy, stating that Apple‚Äôs revenue would be ‚Äòmuch smaller‚Äô without similar ‚Äòmechanics‚Äô ‚Äì likely referring to app store purchases, microtransactions, and perhaps even the allure of consumer electronics that might not always offer groundbreaking utility but capture market imagination. This comparison highlights a complex reality: commercial success doesn‚Äôt always equate to inherent value in the traditional sense. The concept of ‚Äòvalue‚Äô in the crypto space is multifaceted. For some, value is derived from tangible utility ‚Äì a decentralized application that solves a real-world problem, a token that grants governance rights, or an NFT that unlocks exclusive experiences. For others, value is purely speculative, driven by community sentiment, viral trends, and the potential for rapid price appreciation. Solana memecoins often fall squarely into the latter category, their worth determined by collective belief and hype rather than fundamental utility. Aspect Traditional Utility Assets Solana Memecoins & Speculative NFTs Primary Driver of Value Functionality, problem-solving, governance, real-world application Community sentiment, hype, viral trends, scarcity (perceived), speculative trading Long-Term Vision Sustainable ecosystem development, technological advancement, adoption Often short-term gains, entertainment, cultural phenomenon Risk Profile Can be high, but often tied to project fundamentals Extremely high volatility, significant risk of total loss, driven by market whims Impact on Network Drives fundamental usage, secures network, fosters innovation Increases transaction volume, attracts new users (often speculative), raises network profile The Uncomfortable Relationship: Solana Memecoins and Network Growth The growth narrative around Solana in recent months cannot be told without acknowledging the significant role played by Solana memecoins . These tokens, despite their often whimsical nature, have brought a tremendous influx of new users, increased transaction volumes, and generated considerable buzz around the Solana blockchain. Think of it this way: Increased Transaction Volume: Every trade, every transfer of a memecoin, adds to the network‚Äôs transaction count, showcasing its capacity and efficiency. New User Acquisition: The allure of quick gains, or simply the fun of participating in a cultural phenomenon, draws many first-time crypto users to Solana. Developer Attention: High network activity, even if driven by speculative assets, signals a vibrant ecosystem, potentially attracting developers looking to build more substantive applications. Publicity and Awareness: Memecoins often go viral, putting Solana in the headlines and increasing its brand recognition far beyond traditional crypto circles. However, this relationship is a double-edged sword. While the surge in activity is beneficial for network metrics, it also raises questions about the quality of that growth. Is a network truly robust if a significant portion of its activity is driven by assets with no long-term utility? Benefits of Memecoin Popularity for Solana: Enhanced network metrics (transactions, active addresses). Broader public awareness and brand visibility. Attraction of new retail investors to the ecosystem. Increased liquidity for decentralized exchanges on Solana. Challenges Posed by Memecoin Dominance: Potential for network congestion during peak activity, affecting user experience for utility-focused dApps. Risk of reputational damage if many memecoin projects fail or are scams. Distraction from core development and long-term utility building. Reinforcement of the perception that crypto is primarily for speculation, not innovation. Beyond the Hype: What Does This Mean for the Future of Solana Memecoins and the Ecosystem? Anatoly Yakovenko‚Äôs comments are not just a critique; they are also a subtle call to action. His vision for Solana has always centered on building a high-performance blockchain capable of supporting real-world applications, large-scale dApps, and enterprise solutions. The proliferation of Solana memecoins , while beneficial for short-term metrics, potentially diverges from this long-term goal. For investors and developers, Yakovenko‚Äôs perspective offers important actionable insights: For Investors: While the allure of quick profits from memecoins is strong, it‚Äôs crucial to understand the inherent risks. Diversification into projects with clear utility and strong fundamentals on Solana could offer more sustainable long-term value. Due diligence remains paramount. For Developers: Yakovenko‚Äôs stance might signal a renewed focus from the Solana Foundation and core contributors on fostering projects that bring genuine utility. This could mean more support, grants, or visibility for dApps focused on DeFi, gaming (with actual gameplay, not just speculative NFTs), decentralized social media, or enterprise solutions. The future of Solana will likely involve navigating this tension between speculative interest and foundational utility. The network has demonstrated its technical prowess, but sustained growth and adoption will depend on its ability to attract and retain users who seek more than just fleeting entertainment or speculative gains. We‚Äôve seen examples of projects on Solana striving for utility, from decentralized exchanges like Jupiter to gaming platforms like Star Atlas, aiming to build immersive experiences rather than just collectible JPEGs. The challenge is to leverage the attention brought by memecoins to onboard users into these more substantive aspects of the ecosystem, steering towards a more robust and sustainable future. Anatoly Yakovenko‚Äôs ‚Äòdigital slop‚Äô comment on Solana memecoins and NFTs is a powerful, albeit controversial, statement that forces the crypto community to re-evaluate its priorities. While these assets have undeniably fueled Solana‚Äôs recent growth and visibility, their long-term value proposition remains a subject of intense debate. The tension between speculative fun and foundational utility will continue to shape the narrative around Solana. Ultimately, the network‚Äôs enduring success will depend on its ability to balance immediate market trends with its ambitious vision for a truly decentralized and utility-driven future. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. What did Anatoly Yakovenko say about memecoins and NFTs? Solana co-founder Anatoly Yakovenko criticized memecoins and NFTs, labeling them as ‚Äòdigital slop‚Äô with no inherent value, and compared them to loot boxes found in free-to-play mobile games. 2. Why did Yakovenko compare memecoins to loot boxes? He used the comparison to highlight that, like loot boxes, memecoins and NFTs can generate significant revenue and engagement without necessarily offering substantial utility or inherent value, relying more on speculation and addictive mechanics. 3. How have memecoins contributed to Solana‚Äôs growth? Despite his criticism, Yakovenko acknowledged that Solana memecoins have significantly contributed to the network‚Äôs growth by increasing transaction volumes, attracting new users, generating public awareness, and boosting liquidity on Solana-based decentralized exchanges. 4. What is the difference between utility and speculative value in crypto? Utility value is derived from a digital asset‚Äôs practical use or function within an ecosystem (e.g., governance, solving real-world problems). Speculative value, on the other hand, is driven by market sentiment, hype, and the expectation of future price appreciation, often without a strong underlying utility. 5. What is Solana‚Äôs long-term vision according to its co-founder? Anatoly Yakovenko‚Äôs long-term vision for Solana centers on building a high-performance blockchain that supports real-world applications, large-scale decentralized applications (dApps), and enterprise solutions, focusing on utility and technological advancement beyond speculative assets. 6. Should I invest in Solana memecoins? Investing in Solana memecoins carries extremely high volatility and risk due to their speculative nature. While they can offer rapid gains, they also pose a significant risk of total loss. Investors should conduct thorough due diligence, understand the risks involved, and consider diversifying their portfolios with utility-focused projects. Did Anatoly Yakovenko‚Äôs blunt assessment of Solana memecoins resonate with you? Share your thoughts on this provocative topic and join the conversation by sharing this article on your social media platforms! Let‚Äôs explore the future of value in crypto together. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Solana ‚Äòs future price action and ecosystem. This post Solana Memecoins: Anatoly Yakovenko‚Äôs Blunt Critique of ‚ÄòDigital Slop‚Äô first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Want Bitcoin Or Ether Exposure? Advisors Are Quietly Using Treasury Stocks‚ÄîCEO
body: Wirehouse advisors are finding a new way to give clients a taste of Bitcoin and Ethereum without asking them to wrestle with private keys or new wallets. Related Reading: Wall Street‚Äôs Bold Bet: Bitcoin Could Hit $200K By December, Banking Giant Says They‚Äôre pointing clients toward shares in companies like Strategy (MSTR) and Bitmine Immersion Technologies (BMNR). Those stocks hold or mine crypto directly, so owning a share is almost like owning a slice of Bitcoin or Ether itself. Treasury Stocks Offer Direct Crypto Exposure According to recent filings, Ark Invest bought about 4.4 million shares of BMNR, a position worth roughly $175 million. That move highlights how big investors view treasury stocks: they‚Äôre a familiar vehicle wrapped around digital assets. Strategy, for example, has nearly 200,000 BTC on its balance sheet. Bitmine runs mining rigs in Texas and Canada. By picking these stocks, clients get qualified audits, clear tax forms, and the usual oversight that comes with public companies. Robinhood offering a 2% match for crypto transfers, and VCs and other investors shifting staked ETH into Treasury companies (DATs) to double their money when lockups expire. As with $MSTR $BMNR,Treasury stocks are a way wirehouse advisors can give clients exposure to BTC and ETH. https://t.co/CzxOudBSTl ‚Äî Cathie Wood (@CathieDWood) July 26, 2025 A Safer Bet For Investors Advisors consider that setup safer than telling clients to hold coins in a self‚Äëcustodied wallet. It also cuts through some of the more confusing bits of crypto taxes. Instead of a 1099‚ÄëB for every sale, you might only see a single line item covering gains or losses on your brokerage statement. A 1099-B is a tax form used in the US to report capital gains and losses from the sale of securities and other financial instruments. For many investors who still find blockchain a bit foreign, this route feels more like buying energy or software shares. Robinhood‚Äôs Bonus Spurs Transfers Beyond the equity route, Robinhood is trying its own trick to nudge people toward the broader crypto ecosystem. According to Ark Invest CEO Cathie Wood‚Äôs post on X, the platform now offers a 2% reward when users transfer crypto off Robinhood into their own wallets. Related Reading: Bitcoin‚Äôs New Clock: How Wall Street Killed The Old Cycle, According To Expert That small boost can cover transaction fees, or even leave a bit of extra crypto in the user‚Äôs pocket. It‚Äôs an incentive to explore DeFi apps or staking services outside of Robinhood‚Äôs walls. The move tracks closely with Ethereum‚Äôs recent staking unlocks. As lockups on ETH expire, wallets are once again able to send tokens freely. Platforms want to capture that flow. By front‚Äëloading a transfer credit, Robinhood hopes to win new users on the promise of more yield down the road. Featured image from Pexels, chart from TradingView

title: Crypto Adoption‚Äôs Phenomenal Rise: From Scrutiny to Sensation
body: BitcoinWorld Crypto Adoption‚Äôs Phenomenal Rise: From Scrutiny to Sensation Imagine a world where digital currencies, once dismissed as fleeting fads or outright scams, are now embraced by financial giants and everyday investors alike. This isn‚Äôt a futuristic fantasy; it‚Äôs the profound reality highlighted by Binance CEO Richard Teng. He recently took to X (formerly Twitter) to underscore how dramatically attitudes toward cryptocurrency have shifted, marking a monumental turning point in Crypto Adoption . From the widespread skepticism of 2017, when many dismissed crypto as a fraudulent scheme, to the burgeoning institutional embrace unfolding in 2025, the narrative has truly flipped, transforming a doubted concept into a global sensation. The Genesis of Skepticism: Crypto Adoption‚Äôs Rocky Start Cast your mind back to 2017. The cryptocurrency landscape was a wild west of innovation mixed with rampant speculation. While Bitcoin was making headlines with its parabolic surge, it was also attracting its fair share of critics. Many traditional financial experts and media outlets openly questioned its legitimacy, often labeling it as a Ponzi scheme or a tool for illicit activities. The term ‚Äòscam‚Äô was frequently associated with digital assets, fueled by: ICO Mania and Scams: The Initial Coin Offering (ICO) boom saw countless projects emerge, many with little more than a whitepaper and grand promises. Unfortunately, a significant number turned out to be fraudulent, leaving investors with worthless tokens and reinforcing the ‚Äòscam‚Äô narrative. Regulatory Ambiguity: Governments and financial bodies around the world struggled to categorize and regulate cryptocurrencies, leading to an environment of uncertainty and fear. Without clear guidelines, many viewed the space as inherently risky and unregulated. Technical Complexity: For the average person, understanding blockchain technology, private keys, and decentralized networks was daunting. This complexity often bred mistrust, as people tend to be wary of what they don‚Äôt understand. Media Portrayal: Early media coverage often sensationalized crypto‚Äôs volatility and its association with dark web activities, painting a largely negative picture for the general public. During this period, Crypto Adoption was primarily driven by early tech enthusiasts, libertarians, and risk-tolerant investors who saw its revolutionary potential despite the prevailing skepticism. The Unstoppable Tide: Catalysts for Crypto Adoption‚Äôs Transformation Fast forward to today, and the conversation around crypto couldn‚Äôt be more different. Richard Teng‚Äôs observation of crypto‚Äôs journey from ‚Äòscam‚Äô to ‚Äòsensation‚Äô is a testament to several pivotal developments that have fueled this incredible transformation. What exactly ignited this shift in public and institutional perception, accelerating Crypto Adoption to unprecedented levels? Technological Maturation: Beyond Bitcoin, the ecosystem has evolved dramatically. The rise of DeFi (Decentralized Finance), NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens), Layer 2 scaling solutions, and Web3 applications has showcased tangible utility for blockchain technology beyond speculative trading. These innovations are building a new digital economy. Institutional Embrac: Perhaps the most significant catalyst. Major financial institutions, once staunch critics, are now actively participating. The approval of spot Bitcoin ETFs in various regions, the entry of major banks into crypto custody, and the exploration of tokenized assets by traditional finance giants signal a profound shift. These moves lend immense legitimacy and liquidity to the market, paving the way for broader Crypto Adoption . Regulatory Clarity (Emerging): While still a work in progress, many jurisdictions are developing clearer regulatory frameworks for digital assets. This increasing clarity provides a safer environment for both institutions and retail investors, reducing uncertainty and fostering trust. Increased Awareness and Education: As crypto gains mainstream media attention, more resources are available for people to understand its fundamentals. Educational initiatives, podcasts, and accessible platforms have demystified the technology for millions, making Crypto Adoption more approachable. This confluence of factors has propelled crypto from the fringes to the forefront of global finance and technology, making its presence undeniable. Navigating the Future: What‚Äôs Next for Crypto Adoption? As we look towards 2025 and beyond, the trajectory for Crypto Adoption appears to be one of continued growth and integration. Richard Teng‚Äôs remarks underscore that we are merely at the cusp of this transformative era. What does this mean for the future? Mainstream Integration and Tokenization Expect to see cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology seamlessly integrated into everyday life. This could manifest in: Payments: More businesses accepting crypto for goods and services, driven by lower transaction fees and faster settlement times. Asset Tokenization: Real-world assets, from real estate to fine art, being represented as digital tokens on a blockchain, increasing liquidity and accessibility. Central Bank Digital Currencies (CBDCs): Governments exploring and launching their own digital currencies, further legitimizing the underlying technology. Web3 Applications: A shift towards decentralized internet services where users have more control over their data and digital identities. Persistent Challenges in Crypto Adoption While the outlook is overwhelmingly positive, the path to full Crypto Adoption isn‚Äôt without its hurdles. Key challenges include: Scalability: Ensuring blockchain networks can handle a massive influx of users and transactions without compromising speed or cost. User Experience (UX): Simplifying interfaces and processes to make crypto accessible for non-technical users. Regulatory Harmonization: The need for consistent global regulations to prevent arbitrage and foster cross-border innovation. Security: Protecting users from hacks, scams, and cyber threats remains paramount as the ecosystem grows. The Benefits of Widespread Crypto Adoption Despite the challenges, the benefits of widespread Crypto Adoption are compelling: Financial Inclusion: Providing banking services to the unbanked and underbanked populations worldwide. Enhanced Efficiency: Streamlining cross-border payments, supply chain management, and data verification. Economic Empowerment: Enabling individuals to have greater control over their assets and participate directly in new digital economies. Innovation Catalyst: Fostering new business models and technological breakthroughs that were previously unimaginable. Actionable Insights for the Crypto Curious If Richard Teng‚Äôs insights have piqued your interest in the evolving world of crypto, here are some actionable steps: Educate Yourself: Start with the basics. Understand what blockchain is, how cryptocurrencies work, and the different types of digital assets. Reliable sources are key. Start Small: You don‚Äôt need to invest a fortune. Begin with a small amount you‚Äôre comfortable losing, and gradually increase as your understanding and confidence grow. Prioritize Security: Learn about wallet security, two-factor authentication, and how to protect your digital assets from scams. Never share your private keys. Explore Use Cases: Look beyond just trading. Investigate DeFi protocols, NFT marketplaces, or Web3 applications that align with your interests. Stay Informed: The crypto space is dynamic. Follow reputable news sources, industry leaders, and regulatory updates to stay abreast of developments. Richard Teng‚Äôs observation is more than just a comment; it‚Äôs a powerful reflection of a monumental shift. What was once dismissed as a dubious experiment has blossomed into a vibrant, dynamic force shaping the future of finance and technology. The journey from widespread skepticism in 2017 to the growing institutional embrace of 2025 highlights not just the resilience of crypto, but its undeniable potential. As Crypto Adoption continues its phenomenal rise, it promises to unlock new possibilities, redefine traditional systems, and empower individuals globally. This isn‚Äôt just a sensation; it‚Äôs a revolution in progress. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What does ‚ÄúCrypto Adoption‚Äù mean in simple terms? Crypto Adoption refers to the increasing acceptance and use of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology by individuals, businesses, and institutions for various purposes, including payments, investments, and new applications. Q2: Why was crypto considered a ‚Äúscam‚Äù in 2017? In 2017, crypto faced widespread skepticism due to a surge in fraudulent Initial Coin Offerings (ICOs), a lack of clear regulatory frameworks, technical complexity that bred mistrust, and negative media portrayals often linking it to illicit activities. These factors led many to view it as inherently risky or a scam. Q3: How has institutional involvement changed the perception of crypto? Institutional involvement, such as the launch of spot Bitcoin ETFs, major banks offering crypto services, and corporations holding crypto on their balance sheets, has significantly boosted crypto‚Äôs legitimacy. It brings greater liquidity, regulatory oversight, and trust from traditional financial markets, accelerating Crypto Adoption . Q4: What are the main benefits of increased Crypto Adoption? Increased Crypto Adoption offers several benefits, including enhanced financial inclusion for the unbanked, greater efficiency in transactions (especially cross-border), fostering innovation in finance and technology, and empowering individuals with more control over their assets. Q5: What challenges still hinder widespread Crypto Adoption? Despite progress, challenges remain, including scalability issues for blockchain networks, the need for simpler user experiences, fragmented global regulatory frameworks, and ongoing security concerns related to hacks and scams. Q6: What is Richard Teng‚Äôs role in the crypto industry? Richard Teng is the current CEO of Binance, one of the world‚Äôs largest cryptocurrency exchanges. His insights and leadership play a significant role in shaping discussions and trends within the global crypto industry. Did you find this article insightful? Share it with your friends, family, and colleagues on social media to spread awareness about the incredible evolution of cryptocurrency and the growing trend of Crypto Adoption ! To learn more about the latest explore our article on key developments shaping the crypto market‚Äôs institutional adoption. This post Crypto Adoption‚Äôs Phenomenal Rise: From Scrutiny to Sensation first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: US Spot Ethereum ETFs Outpace Bitcoin With $1.8B Weekly Inflows
body: The post US Spot Ethereum ETFs Outpace Bitcoin With $1.8B Weekly Inflows appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News US spot Ethereum ETFs attracted $1.85 billion in inflows last week, dramatically surpassing the $72 million brought in by Bitcoin ETFs. Market leaders like BlackRock‚Äôs Ethereum ETF accounted for much of the inflow, reflecting a shift in investor focus from Bitcoin to Ethereum during July‚Äôs trading sessions

title: SharpLink Gaming kept adding ETH, with up to 77,210 tokens sent to its wallets
body: SharpLink Gaming extended its ETH strategy, immediately moving the new purchase into staking. SharpLink opened a new wallet to transfer $147M in ETH. SharpLink Gaming (SBET) continued its ETH buying program, pouring another $147M into the token. The latest purchase happened over the weekend, as ETH gained momentum and returned to the $3,900 range. The latest on-chain purchase showed SharpLink opened a new wallet for a round of purchases and subsequent ETH distribution. The latest purchase was done through USDC stablecoins, with spot purchases on multiple exchanges. Previously, SharpLink Gaming also added ETH through an OTC deal with the Ethereum Foundation. A newly created wallet has received 38,603 $ETH ($147.7M) and likely belongs to Sharplink Gaming ( @SharpLinkGaming ). The $ETH came from a wallet that previously sent $ETH to SharpLink. 2 days ago, @SharpLinkGaming got $145M $USDC from @circle , sent to #Galaxy , then distributed‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/DzhHaUawcl ‚Äî Onchain Lens (@OnchainLens) July 27, 2025 Additional data collection from known addresses shows SharpLink received up to 77,210 ETH for a total of 438,017 ETH. With the latest addition, SharpLink is closing in on BitMine‚Äôs stash of 566,776 ETH. Before the latest purchase was registered, SharpLink announced 360K ETH in its reserves, still lagging behind BitMine. The company itself reported 360,807 ETH as of July 22. Despite this, the company is the biggest publicly trading entity with an ETH treasury. For now, SharpLink relies on sizeable purchases with no strict schedule. The SBET share price is also diverging from the recent ETH rally, though still up over 121% in the past month. SBET traded at $21.99, with no reaction to the recent treasury announcement. The latest ETH purchase came just days after SharpLink gaming onboarded Joseph Chalom as its co-CEO . The recent buying happened through a wallet that was used as an intermediary before the final destination of ETH. Not all of the SharpLink holdings are traceable to on-chain wallets, and the company holds a predominance of staked ETH in its known wallets. SharpLink Gaming stakes with Figment Just hours after receiving ETH into its wallet, SharpLink Gaming sent some of the tokens to a Figment deposit address. The ETH reached Figment directly through the recently active address, or through another intermediary wallet. SharpLink Gaming sent out multiple tranches of ETH to the Figment ETH 2.0 depositor address. | Source: Arkham Intelligence Figment advertises itself as a staking solution meant for institutions, with a 2.99% annualized yield. Figment also offers slashing insurance coverage, as well as white label services for startups to offer under their own brand. At this point, it remains uncertain if SharpLink Gaming would brand its own validators. SharpLink made several tranches of 3,200 ETH to the Figment ETH 2.0 depositor address, signaling its ETH is used for additional services. Figment remains a multi-chain staking intermediary, with SOL and BTC services. ETH reserves grow exponentially The latest SBET treasury expansion is part of a larger trend, where companies and projects already hold 2.32M ETH in treasuries. The accumulation of ETH started later than the BTC process, and the numbers are still relatively low, with a total valuation of $9B. Treasuries are still to catch up with ETF, which took 5.88M ETH off the market. The buying spree accelerated in July, with multiple daily announcements of treasury expansion. The ETH treasury trend has also offered another option to big holders from previous market cycles. Projects like the Ethereum Name Service (ENS) are active treasury operators. Others, like Golem, are sitting on 100K ETH that has been idle since the project‚Äôs ICO, and may be reused as a treasury. title: Bitget Lists MDTUSDT Perpetual Futures with Support for Trading Bots
body: Victoria, Seychelles, July 28th, 2025, Chainwire Bitget , the leading cryptocurrency exchange and Web3 company, has announced the launch of MDTUSDT perpetual futures trading, now available with up to 20x leverage. The contract went live on July 26 (UTC+8) and is fully integrated with Bitget‚Äôs futures trading bots, enabling users to automate trading strategies around the clock. The MDTUSDT contract offers exposure to MDT, settled in USDT. With a tick size of 0.00001, it is designed for high-frequency traders seeking precision and liquidity. Funding fees are settled every four hours, and the product supports uninterrupted 24/7 trading. Through the use of Bitget‚Äôs automated trading tools, users can execute strategies more efficiently and react swiftly to market changes without manual intervention. Bitget reserves the right to adjust contract parameters, including tick size, leverage limits, and maintenance margin rates, based on ongoing market risk assessments. Traders are advised to consult the official Bitget platform for the most recent updates and trading specifications. The addition of MDTUSDT to Bitget‚Äôs expanding portfolio of perpetual futures contracts underscores the exchange‚Äôs continued focus on offering diverse asset access and advanced trading functionality. For more information, users can visit here . About Bitget Established in 2018, Bitget is the world's leading cryptocurrency exchange and Web3 company. Serving over 120 million users in 150+ countries and regions, the Bitget exchange is committed to helping users trade smarter with its pioneering copy trading feature and other trading solutions, while offering real-time access to Bitcoin price , Ethereum price , and other cryptocurrency prices. Formerly known as BitKeep, Bitget Wallet is a leading non-custodial crypto wallet supporting 130+ blockchains and millions of tokens. It offers multi-chain trading, staking, payments, and direct access to 20,000+ DApps, with advanced swaps and market insights built into a single platform. Bitget is driving crypto adoption through strategic partnerships, such as its role as the Official Crypto Partner of the World's Top Football League, LALIGA , in EASTERN, SEA and LATAM markets, as well as a global partner of Turkish National athletes Buse Tosun √áavu≈üoƒülu (Wrestling world champion), Samet G√ºm√º≈ü (Boxing gold medalist) and ƒ∞lkin Aydƒ±n (Volleyball national team), to inspire the global community to embrace the future of cryptocurrency. Aligned with its global impact strategy, Bitget has joined hands with UNICEF to support blockchain education for 1.1 million people by 2027. In the world of motorsports, Bitget is the exclusive cryptocurrency exchange partner of MotoGP , one of the world‚Äôs most thrilling championships. title: XRP Price Prediction: Analyst Sets $10‚Äì$15 Target Based on These Two Bullish Signals
body: Crypto analyst XRPunkie has published an analysis on the XRP/USDT daily chart, highlighting a bullish Elliott Wave formation and key Fibonacci extension levels that could represent potential take-profit zones for the ongoing upward wave. According to XRPunkie‚Äôs technical projection, XRP is currently in the early stages of a Wave 3 advance, following the conclusion of Waves I through IV earlier in 2025. The chart, based on price action from early 2024 through July 2025, features a detailed overlay of Fibonacci extension levels aligned with Elliott Wave theory to suggest how high the next leg of XRP‚Äôs rally could reach. The analyst pointed to specific Fibonacci extension targets layered between the 1.272 and 3.618 levels. Notable among these are 4.12 USDT at the 1.272 level, 5.31 USDT at the 1.618 level, and 6.00 USDT and 6.16 USDT near the 1.786 and 2.272 levels, respectively. These are identified as likely short-term take-profit areas for those following the wave count and looking to manage risk during Wave 3. XRPunkie also highlighted the 2.618 extension level, around 7.55 USDT, and the 3.0 level at 9.45 USDT, which could potentially mark higher resistance or extended targets for bullish participants. Those fib levels above could be some little Take Profits area for the Wave 3? I believe it could over extend to reach $13. Which is my target of $10-$15. We shall see. $XRP pic.twitter.com/EFtiMnwKRl ‚Äî XRPunkie (@Shawnmark7899) July 25, 2025 XRP‚Äôs Extended Target Range: $10 to $15 Beyond the Fibonacci profit zones, XRPunkie reaffirmed a broader price projection for XRP in the ongoing bullish cycle. The upper boundary of this target range is derived from the 3.618 Fibonacci extension level, which points to approximately 13.59 USDT. XRPunkie commented that this level could be reached through an overextended Wave 3, especially if the current market structure remains intact and momentum continues to build. His anticipated target zone remains between $10 and $15, with the $13.59 level seen as a possible culmination of Wave V if bullish momentum persists. The chart‚Äôs structure shows that XRP has broken out of a long consolidation range that lasted from February through June 2025, following a Wave IV correction. Since then, the price has risen sharply above 3.00 USDT before a recent pullback. The exponential moving average (EMA) at 21 periods and simple moving average (SMA) at 33 periods are both sloping upward, indicating bullish momentum remains intact despite the minor correction underway. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Market Conditions and Timing Considerations The tweet was accompanied by a TradingView chart timestamped July 25, 2025, with the XRP/USDT pair trading at approximately 3.05 USDT. XRPunkie did not provide a fixed timeline for when the projected targets might be achieved, but emphasized that the Wave 3 expansion could be underway. The absence of a strict timeframe underscores the technical nature of the forecast, with a focus on structure rather than time-based predictions. According to the chart, XRP appears to be respecting the projected Fibonacci levels during its ascent. The analyst has placed emphasis on how these levels can act as both price magnets and resistance points. However, XRPunkie also acknowledged the inherent unpredictability in Wave 3 behavior, stating that the move could ‚Äúover extend‚Äù beyond typical targets, reinforcing his confidence in the $10 to $15 price objective throughout this Elliott Wave cycle. XRPunkie‚Äôs tweet presents a technically structured roadmap for XRP‚Äôs potential movement during what he interprets as a developing Wave 3. By combining Fibonacci extensions with Elliott Wave labeling, the analyst provides a specific range of price levels that traders may monitor as the rally progresses. As of the chart‚Äôs posting, XRP trades at just above 3.00 USDT, suggesting that significant upside potential remains if this wave structure unfolds as projected. title: What Percentage of the US Population Owns Cryptocurrency? Are We Still in the Early Stages?
body: Even though cryptocurrencies are becoming more accessible than ever, the vast majority of Americans still remain wary of this asset class. Only 14% of U.S. adults own cryptocurrencies, according to a new Gallup poll conducted in mid-June. While that's an eightfold increase from 2018, it still represents only a small fraction of investors. The survey results reveal deep skepticism among Americans toward cryptocurrencies. Sixty percent of respondents stated they had no interest in purchasing cryptocurrencies, while only 17% expressed curiosity about these assets. Only 4% plan to purchase cryptocurrencies in the near future. Gallup found that 55% of investors with over $10,000 in stocks, bonds, or mutual funds consider crypto ‚Äútoo risky.‚Äù Despite this, ownership among this group has risen to 17% from 2% in 2018. Related News: BREAKING: US President Donald Trump Announced That They Have Reached a Tariff Agreement with the European Union - ‚ÄúThe Biggest Deal Ever‚Äù The ongoing cautious approach to crypto hasn't changed in recent years, despite clearer US regulations and a crypto-friendly president in office. Cryptocurrencies, which entered the mainstream with their 2021 surge, were subsequently eroded by a sharp decline, major bankruptcies like FTX, and various scams that eroded investor confidence. Demographically, crypto ownership is most prevalent among men aged 18-49. This rate is significantly lower among women and older age groups. While college graduates and high-income individuals are showing greater interest in crypto, the elderly and lower-income groups are largely excluded. There's also a continuing lack of knowledge about cryptocurrencies. While nearly all survey participants said they'd heard of them, only 35% said they knew how they worked. The highest levels of knowledge in this area are concentrated among young men and wealthy individuals. Even among those who claim to understand crypto, the vast majority still label the asset class as ‚Äúrisky.‚Äù The perception of it as ‚Äúvery risky‚Äù has risen from 60% in 2021 to 64% by 2025. According to Gallup, one in seven adults in the US owns crypto, while about one in six owns stocks or real estate. Only 4% consider crypto the best long-term investment. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: What Percentage of the US Population Owns Cryptocurrency? Are We Still in the Early Stages?

title: Big Bitcoin Upsides Predicted After Bullish Weekly Close
body: A weekly close above $119,200 will kickstart the breakout from a ‚Äúbull flag‚Äù chart pattern, according to analysis by ‚ÄòRekt Capital‚Äô on Sunday. They added that turning this level into support via a retest could occur over the coming week. Bitcoin closed the week at $119,466 on Coinbase, according to Tradingview, which means that the bullish action could be in play. #BTC Can Bitcoin do it? Weekly Close above ~$119200 kickstarts the breakout from this Bull Flag In which case turning ~$119200 into support via a retest could occur next week (maybe even via a wick) However, for the moment BTC needs to avoid an upside wick beyond the Bull‚Ä¶ https://t.co/fTfnDnRrPL pic.twitter.com/Cp5lqivAYK ‚Äî Rekt Capital (@rektcapital) July 27, 2025 A New Bitcoin ATH This Week? Bitcoin is less than 3% away from its all-time high, having recovered from its dip to $115,000 on Friday. The asset hit an intraday high of $119,754 in late trading on Sunday, resulting in the bullish weekly candle closure. ‚ÄúBitcoin will find ways to shake investors out of their positions during price discovery uptrends,‚Äù said the analyst. Fellow commentator ‚ÄòCrypNeuvo‚Äô identified a large liquidation cluster at $113,800, stating, ‚ÄúI consider the downside liquidation cluster to be the natural target in the mid-term:‚Äù $114,500 to 113,600. There is also an unfilled CME gap at $114,300, which ‚Äúsupports my projection of Bitcoin possibly attacking that liquidation cluster in the next 1-2 weeks,‚Äù he said. Meanwhile, ‚ÄòNunya Bizniz‚Äô zoomed out, saying that there could be a big move to $164,000 before a retest of $109,000 if previous chart patterns repeated. BTC weekly: Pattern repeat = $164K then $109K. pic.twitter.com/jgVvqRhHLD ‚Äî Nunya Bizniz (@Pladizow) July 26, 2025 Bitcoin had returned to the middle of its range-bound channel during the Monday morning Asian trading session, building on weekend momentum. A big week lies ahead with US inflation reports, American and Japanese central bank rate decisions, and a trade tariff deadline, which could all add to the volatility. Ether Setting Up For Monster Move ETH is currently outperforming BTC as it has for the past fortnight. The asset has surged 3.5% on the day to hit a seven-month high of $3,940, and analysts see bigger moves ahead. Ether just posted its fifth green weekly candle in a row, closing at $3,873 on Coinbase, according to Tradingview. Analyst ‚ÄòMerlijn The Trader‚Äô observed a fresh MACD crossover and a three-year squeeze reaching its apex. ‚ÄúBreak $4,200 and ETH will rip like 2021,‚Äù he said. ETHEREUM IS SETTING UP FOR A MONSTER MOVE!! Massive bullish monthly candle Fresh MACD crossover 3-year squeeze reaching its apex Break $4,200 and $ETH will rip like 2021. Those who didn‚Äôt reload‚Ä¶ will remember this moment. DON‚ÄôT SAY WE DIDN‚ÄôT SIGNAL IT. pic.twitter.com/FqA0LPj1OL ‚Äî Merlijn The Trader (@MerlijnTrader) July 27, 2025 Despite the mammoth monthly move by Ether, the asset remains down almost 20% from its 2021 all-time high. Nevertheless, most are in agreement that this is now just a matter of time, given the unprecedented demand for the asset from institutions and corporations.
