title: Why the U.S. Can‚Äôt Let the Stock Market Crash
body: The U.S. stock market isn‚Äôt just a tool for investors‚Äîit‚Äôs become essential to keeping the government funded. As shocking as it sounds, a significant portion of federal tax revenue now comes from capital gains , most of which are realized by the wealthiest Americans. With the top 1% owning roughly half of all U.S. stocks, and the top 10% holding over 90%, financial markets have essentially become a tax pipeline. While wages have barely kept up with inflation, financial assets like stocks have soared , growing faster than both the economy (GDP) and the money supply. That widening gap isn‚Äôt just about wealth inequality‚Äîit‚Äôs also how the government plugs its budget hole. In 2021, capital gains taxes hit a record 8.8% of GDP and made up around 15% of total tax revenue. If markets fall, so does that income, making budget shortfalls even worse. The system creates a feedback loop. As the federal deficit grows and productivity from new debt declines, Washington leans more on rising asset values to sustain itself. Corporate profits‚Äîheavily tied to the S&P 500‚Äîare one of the few economic elements outpacing debt and inflation. That‚Äôs why policymakers are incentivized to keep asset prices rising , whether through low interest rates, quantitative easing, or even quietly supporting markets via tools like the so-called "Plunge Protection Team." At the same time, income from work is taxed more heavily than investment returns. Long-term capital gains enjoy lower rates, benefiting the wealthy and reducing tax collections by an estimated $345 billion annually. It‚Äôs a policy choice that favors wealth hoarding over labor. Unless there‚Äôs serious tax reform, like aligning capital gains rates with regular income or closing loopholes, the government‚Äôs dependence on stock market growth will only deepen. In simple terms: if the market crashes hard, the federal budget does too. That‚Äôs why a major downturn is something Washington can‚Äôt afford to let happen.

title: Breaking: SuperRare Staking Contract Hit by $730K Exploit‚Äî$RARE Token Unscathed
body: The NFT marketplace SuperRare‚Äôs RareStakingV1 contract was exploited, allowing attackers to drain 11.9M RARE tokens. Importantly, the vulnerability did not compromise the underlying $RARE token contract or its core functionalities. SuperRare‚Äôs exploited RareStakingV1 contract was part of the platform‚Äôs staking and curation initiative launched in August 2023. The Rare Protocol was introduced as a solution to a persistent problem in the NFT space: quality curation and creator discovery. Through its Curation Staking mechanism, participants use the native $RARE token to stake on artists, join their Community Pools, and receive rewards when those artists make sales. SuperRare Staking Contract Exploit Origin: Faulty Permission Check in updateMerkleRoot According to the alert from Web3 security firm Blockaid and threat intelligence platform MistEye, the exploit stemmed from a flawed permission check in the ‚ÄúupdateMerkleRoot‚Äù function within the RareStakingV1 contract. Our real-time exploit detection systems had identified malicious transactions targeting one of the staking contracts used by @SuperRare The attacker had deployed an exploit contract ‚Äì but the actual attack was performed by a frontrunner one block later. Updates in pic.twitter.com/WzqePDzbhJ ‚Äî Blockaid (@blockaid_) July 28, 2025 The function was designed to restrict updates to the Merkle Root, which verifies staking and rewards claims. However, the code failed to enforce this, letting anyone modify the Merkle Root and claim tokens. SlowMist TI Alert MistEye detected that @SuperRare has been exploited. The root cause for this exploit was an incorrect permission check in the updateMerkleRoot function, allowing anyone to modify the Merkle Root and claim tokens. As always, stay vigilant!‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/n5J0o6hqgq ‚Äî SlowMist (@SlowMist_Team) July 28, 2025 As a result, any address could pass verification and make unauthorized claims. Blockaid reported that the exploit unfolded in two steps: first, the attacker deployed an exploit contract. Before the attacker could execute their exploit, another address observed the pending transaction and front-ran it in the following block, successfully draining the funds. Cyvers confirmed this front-running event and traced the original attacker‚Äôs funding to Tornado Cash about 186 days earlier. ALERT Our system has detected a malicious transaction targeting a @SuperRare staking contract. The attacker‚Äôs address, funded via @TornadoCash approximately 186 days ago, executed the exploit and gained 731K worth of $RARE . The stolen funds currently remain in the attacker‚Äôs‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/9CZ6IG4b4B ‚Äî Cyvers Alerts (@CyversAlerts) July 28, 2025 However, further research revealed that the attacker might be ‚Äúan active DeFi farmer,‚Äù as the address has interacted with several platforms, including Pendle, Uniswap, Odos, Reservoir, and Morpho. Notably, the funds, valued at approximately $731,000, remain in the attacker‚Äôs contract and have not been moved or laundered through exchanges or mixing services. As of now, SuperRare has not released a post-mortem or detailed remediation plan. First Exploit After NFT Market Roars Back with $1B Revival This exploit comes as the NFT sector begins to show signs of resurgence. After a long market slump, the NFT space added over $1 billion in value in just 24 hours, with trading volumes soaring 287% to $37.4 million. NFT market cap surges 94% to $6.6 billion in July as CryptoPunk sells for $5 million with blue-chip collections driving 40% price jump. #NFTs #Trading https://t.co/e7qERHc30M ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) July 25, 2025 This resurgence is closely tied to Ethereum‚Äôs ongoing rally, with ETH gaining 55% over the past month and momentarily hitting $3,814, its highest price since December 2024. Because many NFTs are priced in ETH, its bullish momentum has revitalized buyer interest and driven up floor prices across top collections. CryptoPunks and Pudgy Penguins have emerged as frontrunners in this recovery. CryptoPunks saw a 16% rise in floor price to 47.5 ETH (approximately $179,000), generating $14 million in sales over 24 hours. Pudgy Penguins followed closely, pulling in $5.7 million in daily trading volume and a 15% increase in floor price. The post Breaking: SuperRare Staking Contract Hit by $730K Exploit‚Äî$RARE Token Unscathed appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Wine and spirit makers push for coverage in EU-U.S. tariff deal
body: European wine and spirit makers are uneasy about being left out of the new U.S.‚ÄìEU trade deal and are pushing for their own exemption. It still allows for a separate deal on alcohol tariffs, but leaders warn that any delay could cut sales and squeeze profits. European Commission President Ursula‚ÄØvon‚ÄØder Leyen said on Sunday that the new framework , which would impose 15% duties on some imports to the United‚ÄØStates, does not yet cover wine and spirits. She added that discussions to secure terms for that sector are due to continue in the coming weeks, as reported by CNBC . The promise of a tariff reprieve comes at a crucial time for spirit makers, which have faced weak consumer spending and changing drinking habits. EU alcohol makers look for relief Early on Monday, shares of Pernod‚ÄØRicard, Remy‚ÄØCointreau, Diageo and Davide‚ÄØCampari went up on hopes of an exemption, only to retrace those gains as the outlook remains unclear. By contrast, brewers slipped, even after Heineken announced stronger‚Äëthan‚Äëforecast results for the first half of the year, warning of softer demand in both the U.S. and Europe. CEEV, representing Europe‚Äôs vintners, has called for wine to be placed on the planned tariff‚Äëfree list. Marzia‚ÄØVarvaglione, president of CEEV, said on Sunday, ‚Äú[We] are watching with great anticipation the outcome of the upcoming negotiations regarding the list of products that will be included under the 0‚Äëfor‚Äë0 tariff arrangement, among them some agricultural products.‚Äù She added, ‚ÄúWe truly believe the trade of wine is of great benefit for both EU and U.S. companies.‚Äù The pact establishes no duties on specific high‚Äëpriority items, including aircraft and related components, certain chemicals, generic medicines and semiconductor equipment, while applying a 15% rate to other goods within its scope. Officials say discussions continue over which additional products might be exempt, with certain agricultural and industrial goods still under consideration. U.S. distillers also hope for exemptions Chris Swonger, head of the U.S. Distilled Spirits Council, expressed confidence that an expanded exemption will be finalized shortly. ‚ÄúWe are optimistic that in the days ahead this positive meeting and agreement will lead to a return to zero‚Äëfor‚Äëzero tariffs for U.S. and EU spirits products,‚Äù he said in a statement. According to Eurostat, alcohol shipments to America reached roughly‚ÄØ‚Ç¨9‚ÄØbillion (about‚ÄØ$10.5‚ÄØbillion) in 2024, while U.S. exporters dispatched approximately‚ÄØ$1.2‚ÄØbillion in spirits to European markets, the Distilled‚ÄØSpirits Council reports. Many European distillers have endured several quarters of subdued demand amid trade tensions and a post‚Äëpandemic slowdown . Morningstar‚Äôs Verushka‚ÄØShetty has cautioned that uncertainty over duties could weigh on margins, even as firms plan to offset increases through price adjustments. CEEV has also warned that new tariffs could force wineries to raise prices or exit the U.S. market entirely, recalling that a previous 10% levy imposed during President Donald Trump‚Äôs administration coincided with around a 12% drop in turnover for EU wine producers. ‚ÄúWhile producers may absorb part of the increase to lessen the impact on consumers, this approach is not always feasible or effective,‚Äù CEEV Secretary General Dr‚ÄØIgnacio‚ÄØSanchez‚ÄØRecarte said by email. title: Ethereum Is About To Breakout Of Massive Consolidation Toward $5,000
body: Crypto analyst BATMAN has revealed that Ethereum is primed to make a parabolic run to a new all-time high (ATH) of $5,000. The analyst also mentioned the first resistance that ETH needs to break to reach this psychological level. Ethereum Ready To Break Out And Reach $5,000 In an X post, BATMAN noted that Ethereum is ready to break out of a massive consolidation and rally towards $5,000. He stated that the first resistance is between $4,000 and $4,200. Once that is done, there is no resistance until between $4,800 and $5,000, which could spark this rally to the $5,000 psychological level. Related Reading: Crypto Founder Reveals What Will Drive Ethereum Price To $10,000 The analyst declared that Ethereum is still in bullish territory and outperforming Bitcoin. As such, he believes any dips from here could be strong buy zones. Indeed, ETH is currently outperforming BTC. The former is up over 61% in the last 30 days while the latter is up just 11% during this period. It is also worth noting that Ethereum is already looking to reclaim the first resistance between $4,000 and $4,200. The largest altcoin by market just recently broke above $3,900 and is now looking to touch $4,000 for the first time since November last year. Crypto analyst Titan of Crypto also indicated that a parabolic move may be on the horizon for ETH. In an X post, he stated that the ETH/BTC chart is heading to the reload zone, which could spark a massive breakout for Ethereum. His accompanying chart showed that the altcoin could rally to between $7,300 and $8,700 on this move. This suggests that a rally to $5,000, as predicted by BATMAN, is unlikely to signal the top for ETH in this market cycle. ETH Dominance Also On The Rise In an X post, crypto analyst Rekt Capital revealed that Ethereum‚Äôs dominance is on the rise, increasing to around 12% for the first time in five years. He noted that the last time the ETH dominance reached 12% was exactly five years ago, in July 2020. With this latest increase, Rekt Capital stated that the altcoin‚Äôs dominance is now looking to reach as high as 14%. Related Reading: This Ethereum Descending Broadening Wedge Pattern Looks Similar To 2019-2020, Here‚Äôs What Happened Last Time This development is significant as it could usher in altcoin season, led by Ethereum. Blockchain Center data shows that the altcoin season index has surged recently to 47, although it still needs to touch 75 for it to be considered altcoin season. Crypto analyst Mikybull Crypto believes this should happen soon, especially with a golden cross forming on the ETH/BTC chart. At the time of writing, the Ethereum price is trading at around $3,900, up over 3% in the last 24 hours, according to data from CoinMarketCap. Featured image from iStock, chart from Tradingview.com

title: Best Crypto for Future: BlockDAG, AVAX, SHIB, & UNI Make Crypto Easy to Learn
body: Crypto today isn‚Äôt just about profits or complicated charts. It‚Äôs become more like a game, a learning space, and even a bit of a challenge. For those just getting started, finding the best crypto for the future doesn‚Äôt have to mean diving into complexity or chasing trends. It‚Äôs about picking projects that make things simple, rewarding, and even enjoyable. Whether it‚Äôs a gamified presale, staking, or low-cost tools, these four stand out by helping users learn through hands-on experience. 1. BlockDAG (BDAG): Making Crypto Feel Like a Game For people new to crypto, BlockDAG brings something different to the table. With its Buyer Battles feature, users get to join a live leaderboard where top contributors earn bonuses. Rather than spending on ads, BlockDAG puts growth in the hands of the community. The more someone contributes, the higher they rank, and the bigger their reward. It‚Äôs fun, easy to follow, and it turns every purchase into a competition. But there‚Äôs more than just entertainment here. BlockDAG has already pulled in over $354 million during its presale, now in batch 29, with the current price at $0.0276. A special limited-time batch offers the price at $0.0016, which equals a 2,660% ROI from the earliest stage. Over 24.4 billion coins have been sold so far, showing just how active the community really is. By combining learning with excitement, BlockDAG gives beginners a real chance to get involved, not just watch from the sidelines. 2. Shiba Inu (SHIB): Starting With a Meme, Growing With Purpose Shiba Inu started as a meme coin, but it has grown into something more serious. Originally meant as a playful alternative to Dogecoin, SHIB has since added ShibaSwap, NFT projects, and even Shibarium, a new layer-2 blockchain. What makes SHIB stand out is how it lowers the barrier to entry. You can buy millions of tokens with very little money, making it less risky for newcomers. More importantly, its community has built an easy path for beginners to follow. With active groups on Telegram, Reddit, and Discord, users get guidance, memes, and tutorials all in one place. Whether you want to stake, swap, or just see where the journey goes, SHIB gives new users a stress-free way to get started. 3. Avalanche (AVAX): Built for Speed and Ease Avalanche is a great option for anyone curious about what happens after they buy their first coin. Known for its high-speed performance, AVAX supports everything from NFTs to full decentralized applications, without overwhelming users. Its native token, AVAX, powers transactions and staking, which lets beginners earn passive income while getting used to the platform. Instead of demanding tech skills, Avalanche keeps things beginner-friendly. Well-known platforms like Trader Joe are built on it, allowing users to trade, lend, or farm tokens with just a few steps. Low fees and quick speeds also remove a lot of the usual roadblocks for newcomers. If you‚Äôre looking to explore the wider crypto world with minimal friction, AVAX is a strong contender for the best crypto for future . 4. Uniswap (UNI): The Gateway to DeFi Uniswap often serves as the first decentralized exchange people try after leaving centralized platforms. Its token, UNI, allows holders to vote on platform changes, but the biggest draw is its simplicity. Users can swap thousands of tokens right from their wallets, no sign-ups or ID checks needed. For beginners, it‚Äôs a straightforward intro to DeFi. The layout is clean, and using it is as simple as choosing your coins, connecting your wallet, and clicking confirm. UNI also introduces users to staking, liquidity pools, and governance in a way that doesn‚Äôt feel overwhelming. It‚Äôs more than just a swap tool, it‚Äôs a real-time learning experience that helps users grow confident in handling DeFi. Learning Through Experience Matters Most When it comes to the best crypto for future , it‚Äôs not all about chasing the next moonshot. What really matters is getting involved, learning by doing, and growing more confident with every move. BlockDAG makes it fun with Buyer Battles that mix engagement with real rewards. AVAX keeps things fast and simple for anyone just starting out. SHIB uses its strong culture to guide new users, and UNI lets you dive into DeFi without needing a technical background. Everyone has to start somewhere. These four cryptos don‚Äôt just build portfolios, they help build knowledge too. The post Best Crypto for Future: BlockDAG, AVAX, SHIB, & UNI Make Crypto Easy to Learn appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

title: XRP Is Replacing SWIFT? Ripple CEO Garlinghouse Relates
body: In a powerful video clip shared by Levi of Crypto Crusaders, Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse delivered a pointed critique of the traditional SWIFT banking network, emphasizing XRP‚Äôs growing role as a modern solution. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm always amazed, SWIFT has a reported error rate of 6%,‚Äù Garlinghouse stated, highlighting the inefficiencies plaguing the decades-old global payment system. Garlinghouse didn‚Äôt stop there. ‚ÄúWe have an observer on our board of directors who‚Äôs the CFO of a Fortune 50 company,‚Äù he explained. ‚ÄúHe told us that in their experience, doing a lot of cross-border transactions, they see an 11% error rate.‚Äù These failure rates are not only alarming but unacceptable in an age that demands speed, transparency, and precision. Human Errors, Delays, and Mounting Costs Although these errors are often correctable, Garlinghouse pointed out that the reliance on manual intervention slows everything down. ‚ÄúThis isn‚Äôt to say these aren‚Äôt correctable,‚Äù he said, ‚Äúbut human intervention is required, and it slows things down, and obviously, there are costs associated with them.‚Äù XRP IS REPLACING SWIFT! pic.twitter.com/54s5JEqKuo ‚Äî Levi | Crypto Crusaders (@LeviRietveld) July 27, 2025 Under SWIFT‚Äôs model, payments must pass through several correspondent banks, each introducing potential points of failure and delay. This leads to high transaction fees, settlement uncertainty, and inefficiency that Ripple believes should no longer exist in a digitally connected global economy. The $10 Trillion Liquidity Trap Garlinghouse went on to underscore what he described as SWIFT‚Äôs most damaging flaw: the global liquidity trap. ‚ÄúThe most impactful issue is the trapped liquidity that‚Äôs inherent in cross-border and correspondent banking networks,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve seen estimates from major consulting firms suggesting that $10 trillion is trapped in accounts around the world, just to enable the current correspondent banking infrastructure.‚Äù This idle capital, locked in Nostro and Vostro accounts, is essentially frozen. It can‚Äôt be used productively because it‚Äôs needed to support legacy systems. According to Garlinghouse, ‚ÄúTo the extent we can make it more efficient, [we] can dramatically change the economics of many different payment companies and banks.‚Äù We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Ripple‚Äôs Mission: Replace, Not Partner with SWIFT Unlike other blockchain companies looking to integrate with legacy systems, Ripple‚Äôs strategy is bold and unapologetic. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre not partnering with SWIFT, we‚Äôre replacing them, ‚Äù Garlinghouse declared in a previous statement, and his latest remarks reinforce this stance. Through RippleNet and its On-Demand Liquidity (ODL) system, powered by XRP, the company is enabling institutions to bypass pre-funded accounts and settle international payments in seconds. The efficiency, accuracy, and liquidity optimization XRP offers stand in stark contrast to SWIFT‚Äôs sluggish and error-prone framework. XRP Poised to Redefine Global Payments Brad Garlinghouse‚Äôs comments, as shared by Levi of Crypto Crusaders, paint a clear picture: Ripple isn‚Äôt just disrupting global finance, it‚Äôs reinventing it. By solving SWIFT‚Äôs deep-rooted problems, error rates, delays, and trapped liquidity, Ripple positions XRP as the future backbone of international payments. As adoption grows and global institutions increasingly seek faster, cheaper, and more reliable solutions, XRP‚Äôs role as a replacement to SWIFT becomes not just possible, but inevitable. Readers are urged to do in-depth research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. Follow us on Twitter , Facebook , Telegram , and Google News The post XRP Is Replacing SWIFT? Ripple CEO Garlinghouse Relates appeared first on Times Tabloid .

title: XRP holders join GoldenMining and choose the stable solution to earn huge wealth
body: At 2 a.m. New York time on July 28, the current value of a single XRP is fluctuating at $3.32. Whether it will continue to grow or face a blow depends on policy uncertainty. Many holders pursue stability. Instead of simply holding currency and letting asset fluctuations be controlled by others, it is better to choose a stable investment that suits them. Smart currency holders no longer simply hold their currency and wait for the right time to sell, but are looking for ways to avoid risks and earn stable returns. GoldenMining , a cloud mining platform headquartered in London, has launched a more forward-looking investment portfolio solution by combining XRP holdings with stable mining income. XRP holders earn stable cash flow using GoldenMining Through keen business analysis, GoldenMining realized that the stable investment market for cryptocurrencies is unprecedentedly huge, and launched the GoldenMining cloud mining platform in 2023. The cloud mining contract model provided by this platform can help investors achieve daily profit settlement without relying on the rise and fall of the secondary market. The firm‚Äôs $2B ‚ÄúStretch‚Äù Preferred Stock offers a 9% yield, backed indirectly by BTC. According to the prediction market Polymarket, the probability has surged to 58% , a 21% jump in the last 24 hours alone. The firm currently holds 607,770 BTC, acquired at an average price of $71,756. This puts Strategy within striking distance of the target as Bitcoin itself trades near $119,000, just shy of its all-time high of $123,000. Institutions vs. Short-Term Traders This buying momentum comes amid a broader institutional scramble to accumulate Bitcoin and Ethereum, even as short-term on-chain traders, those holding BTC for 1 to 3 months, see just 13% in unrealized profits. title: BNB price hits $860 as Nano Labs increases BNB holdings to 128K
body: The price of BNB has soared to a new all-time high at $860, with institutional interest in the cryptocurrency rising as more publicly traded companies add BNB as a treasury asset. Among the key players driving this momentum is Nano Labs Ltd, a leading web3 infrastructure and product solution provider in China. The company, listed on Nasdaq, has significantly bolstered its BNB holdings to add to the token‚Äôs potential bullish momentum towards $1,000. Nano Labs buys more BNB, now holds 128,000 tokens Nano Labs announced on July 28 that it had increased its BNB holdings to 128,000 tokens. According to Nano, the new purchases have pushed the company‚Äôs holdings to over $108 million at the market price of $850 per BNB. The company said it recently acquired an additional 8,000 BNB tokens through an over-the-counter (OTC) transaction. Nano scooped the tokens at an average price of $801 per token. With an average acquisition cost of $713 per token across its portfolio, Nano Labs‚Äô strategic reserve reflects a calculated bet on BNB‚Äôs future growth. Nano Labs @NanoLabsLtd ¬∑ Follow üö® Official UpdateNano Labs has increased its $BNB holdings to 128,000 tokens.Based on the current market price of US$850 per BNB, the total value of the Company‚Äôs BNB strategic reserve now exceeds US$108 million. This marks the latest advancement in Nano Labs‚Äô long-term 3:35 pm ¬∑ 28 Jul 2025 53 Reply Copy link Read 13 replies Buying more of Binance‚Äôs native token aligns with Nano Labs‚Äô long-term BNB reserve strategy, the company said. The buys do more than make Nano a top holder of BNB ‚Äì it allows it to deepen its integration within the growing BNB ecosystem. Notably, Nano Labs‚Äô leadership has also emphasised that its decision to add the cryptocurrency to its balance sheet aligns with its broader crypto vision. Nano wants to capitalise on the expanding adoption of BNB in decentralised finance and blockchain infrastructure. With 128,000 tokens, Nano Labs is now a significant stakeholder in the BNB market. BNB price ‚Äì is the next target $1,000? Nano Labs‚Äô latest buy saw BNB price briefly surpass the $860 mark as the altcoin extended its gains amid new all-time high moves. BNB traded around $846, per CoinMarketCap, with its market cap rising to $119 billion. Daily volume rose to above $3.4 billion with a 94% increase. This surge of BNB‚Äôs price above $800 has sparked trader speculation about the cryptocurrency‚Äôs next milestone. Notably, analysts are eyeing $1,000 as the next psychological barrier, with BNB showing greater resilience amid strong fundamentals. BNB Chain‚Äôs growth and institutional interest, exemplified by Nano Labs‚Äô aggressive accumulation strategy, are key factors to consider for BNB. Upside momentum may also be helped by the anticipation around spot crypto exchange-traded funds. Solana, XRP and Litecoin lead in this respect, but there‚Äôs a lot of upbeat sentiment around BNB and other coins. title: These 5 cryptos could 15x by Q4 this year, far better bull run picks than ETH or DOGE

title: SharpLink Gaming Buys $295M in Ether, Tightens Grip as Second-Largest ETH Holder
body: SharpLink Gaming has cemented its position as a major player in the Ethereum ecosystem, acquiring an additional 77,210 ETH‚Äîvalued at approximately $295 million‚Äîin a single transaction. This recent purchase pushes its total Ether holdings beyond 438,000 ETH, worth over $1.69 billion, making it the second-largest corporate holder of Ether after Bitmine Immersion Technologies. What makes this acquisition more striking is that it surpasses Ethereum‚Äôs net issuance for the past 30 days, which stood at 72,795 ETH, according to blockchain data provider Ultra Sound Money. The company has already staked the majority of its new ETH to generate passive rewards, further demonstrating its long-term confidence in the Ethereum network. In a post on X, SharpLink emphasized the operational edge of Ethereum over traditional finance, writing, ‚ÄúBanks close on weekends. Ethereum runs 24/7.‚Äù SharpLink Treasury Expansion Fueled by Capital Raise SharpLink‚Äôs aggressive ETH accumulation strategy comes as the company seeks to massively expand its war chest. On July 18, it filed an amended prospectus to raise its stock sale target from $1 billion to $6 billion. The bulk of these funds, as previously confirmed, will be directed toward further ETH purchases, aligning with its treasury-first crypto strategy. The firm is also undergoing strategic leadership changes. On Friday, it announced the appointment of former BlackRock executive Joseph Chalom as its new co-CEO. Chalom brings two decades of experience from the world‚Äôs largest asset management firm and is expected to guide SharpLink‚Äôs global strategy in the evolving Web3 space. In May, the company also named Joseph Lubin, co-founder of Ethereum and CEO of Consensys, as chairman of its board of directors, signaling a strong alignment with Ethereum‚Äôs core ecosystem. Institutional Buying Sparks Fears of ETH Supply Squeeze SharpLink‚Äôs massive Ether haul comes amid growing concerns about a potential ETH supply shock. The current leader in ETH corporate holdings, Bitmine Immersion Technologies, now owns over 566,000 ETH , valued above $2 billion. Bitmine has revealed ambitions to eventually hold 5% of ETH‚Äôs total circulating supply‚Äîroughly 6 million ETH worth over $23 billion. According to the Strategic ETH Reserve, corporations and ETFs now collectively hold about 6.73% of all ETH in existence‚Äîtotaling 8.12 million ETH, currently worth more than $31 billion. With increasing institutional interest, ETH‚Äôs circulating supply is tightening , a trend that could contribute to long-term upward price pressure. The post SharpLink Gaming Buys $295M in Ether, Tightens Grip as Second-Largest ETH Holder appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

title: Strategy Makes Second Break in Bitcoin! Here's the Latest Amount of BTC in Hand!
body: The biggest institutional Bitcoin bull, Strategy (formerly MicroStrategy), is resuming its weekly buying streak. At this point, Strategy announced that it did not purchase Bitcoin (BTC) between July 21-27. The company, which last purchased 6,220 BTC worth $739.8 million at an average price of $118,940 between July 14 and 20, still holds 607,770 BTC purchased at approximately $71,756 per Bitcoin, worth approximately $43.61 billion. As you may recall, Strategy paused its Bitcoin purchases in the first week of July. Having not purchased BTC last week, this is the second time the company has paused its Bitcoin purchases since April. title: BNB Investment: Liminatus Pharma‚Äôs Revolutionary $500M Leap into Digital Assets
body: BitcoinWorld BNB Investment: Liminatus Pharma‚Äôs Revolutionary $500M Leap into Digital Assets Imagine a Nasdaq-listed healthcare giant, traditionally focused on life-saving pharmaceuticals, suddenly making headlines for a massive foray into the volatile world of cryptocurrency. This isn‚Äôt a hypothetical scenario; it‚Äôs the groundbreaking reality of Liminatus Pharma‚Äôs recent announcement. The company is set to embark on a revolutionary $500 million BNB investment , signaling a bold and long-term commitment to digital assets. This move isn‚Äôt just a ripple; it‚Äôs a potential tidal wave that could redefine corporate treasury management and digital asset strategies across diverse industries. What exactly does this unprecedented step entail, and why is a healthcare firm betting big on BNB? What‚Äôs Driving Liminatus Pharma‚Äôs Bold BNB Investment ? Liminatus Pharma, a prominent name on the Nasdaq exchange, isn‚Äôt simply dipping its toes into the crypto waters. Their strategy involves the formation of a dedicated subsidiary, American BNB Strategy. This new entity is specifically designed to manage and deploy up to $500 million in phased investments into BNB. This isn‚Äôt a speculative gamble but rather a meticulously planned, long-term digital asset strategy, as reported by Business Insider. The decision to establish a separate subsidiary underscores the seriousness and strategic intent behind this venture. It suggests a desire to: Isolate Risk: By creating a distinct entity, Liminatus Pharma can compartmentalize the financial risks associated with cryptocurrency investments, protecting its core pharmaceutical operations. Focus Expertise: American BNB Strategy will likely house a team with specialized knowledge in digital assets, trading, and blockchain technology, ensuring professional management of the investment. Ensure Compliance: A dedicated subsidiary can navigate the complex and evolving regulatory landscape of cryptocurrencies more effectively, ensuring adherence to financial regulations. The ‚ÄúAmerican BNB Strategy ‚Äú: A Closer Look at the New Subsidiary The creation of American BNB Strategy highlights a sophisticated approach to entering the digital asset space. Rather than a direct corporate treasury allocation, which might face more immediate scrutiny and integrate directly into the parent company‚Äôs balance sheet, a subsidiary offers flexibility and strategic advantages. This entity will be responsible for: Capital Raising: Securing the necessary funds for the $500 million investment. This could involve internal capital allocation from Liminatus Pharma or external fundraising specific to the subsidiary. Phased Deployment: The term ‚Äòphased investments‚Äô is crucial. It suggests a systematic, dollar-cost averaging approach, or investments triggered by specific market conditions, rather than a single, lump-sum purchase. This strategy aims to mitigate volatility risks by spreading the investment over time. Asset Management: Beyond initial acquisition, the subsidiary will manage the BNB holdings, potentially engaging in staking, yield farming, or other strategies to optimize returns, while adhering to the parent company‚Äôs risk parameters. This structured approach indicates that Liminatus Pharma views its BNB investment not as a fleeting trend but as a fundamental component of its future financial resilience and innovation. Why BNB ? Understanding Liminatus Pharma‚Äôs Strategic Choice In the vast ocean of cryptocurrencies, why did Liminatus Pharma specifically choose BNB, the native token of the Binance ecosystem, for such a significant investment? While Bitcoin and Ethereum often dominate headlines for corporate treasury allocations, BNB offers a unique set of advantages that align with a long-term digital asset strategy: Robust Ecosystem: BNB powers the Binance ecosystem, which includes Binance Exchange (the world‚Äôs largest crypto exchange by trading volume) and Binance Smart Chain (now BNB Chain), a popular blockchain for decentralized applications (dApps), DeFi, and NFTs. This broad utility provides inherent demand and value. Utility and Fees: BNB can be used to pay for trading fees on Binance Exchange, participate in token sales on Binance Launchpad, and as gas fees on BNB Chain. This practical utility creates continuous demand for the token. Growing Developer Activity: BNB Chain has seen significant growth in developer activity and user adoption due to its lower transaction fees and faster processing times compared to some other major blockchains. This ecosystem growth can contribute to BNB‚Äôs long-term value. Deflationary Mechanisms: Binance regularly conducts ‚Äòburns‚Äô of BNB, permanently removing tokens from circulation. This deflationary mechanism, similar to stock buybacks, can increase the scarcity and potentially the value of the remaining tokens over time. While BNB is still subject to market volatility, its established ecosystem, diverse utility, and deflationary model likely presented a compelling case for Liminatus Pharma‚Äôs strategic BNB investment . It represents a bet on a thriving, expansive blockchain network rather than just a store of value. Potential Benefits and Challenges of this Liminatus Pharma BNB Investment Every groundbreaking financial decision comes with its own set of opportunities and hurdles. Liminatus Pharma‚Äôs substantial BNB investment is no exception. Understanding these aspects is crucial for appreciating the full scope of their strategic move. Potential Benefits: Diversification of Treasury Assets: Traditional corporate treasuries are heavily invested in fiat currencies, bonds, and equities. A significant allocation to digital assets like BNB provides a hedge against inflation and currency devaluation, diversifying risk away from conventional markets. Potential for Significant Returns: While volatile, the cryptocurrency market has historically offered higher returns compared to traditional asset classes. A well-timed and strategically managed investment in BNB could yield substantial profits for Liminatus Pharma. Innovation and Future-Proofing: Embracing digital assets positions Liminatus Pharma as a forward-thinking company, open to technological advancements. This can enhance its brand image, attract talent, and potentially open doors to future blockchain-based healthcare solutions. Early Mover Advantage (in its sector): As a Nasdaq-listed healthcare company, Liminatus Pharma is among the pioneers in its specific industry to make such a large-scale crypto commitment. This could provide a competitive edge and valuable experience in a nascent but rapidly growing asset class. Challenges and Risks: Market Volatility: Cryptocurrencies are notoriously volatile. A $500 million investment can see significant fluctuations in value, potentially impacting financial statements and investor confidence. Regulatory Uncertainty: The regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies remains fragmented and evolving across different jurisdictions. Changes in regulations could impact the legality, tax treatment, or operational aspects of the BNB investment . Security Risks: Storing and managing large amounts of cryptocurrency requires robust cybersecurity measures to prevent hacks, theft, or loss of private keys. The subsidiary will need top-tier security protocols. Reputational Concerns: Despite growing acceptance, some traditional investors and stakeholders may still view cryptocurrency as risky or speculative, potentially leading to skepticism or criticism. Operational Complexities: Managing a digital asset portfolio requires specialized knowledge, infrastructure, and ongoing monitoring, adding a layer of operational complexity to Liminatus Pharma‚Äôs business. Broader Implications: Is This the Future of Corporate Digital Asset Strategies? Liminatus Pharma‚Äôs bold move raises a pivotal question: Is this an isolated incident, or does it herald a new era where companies across all sectors, even those far removed from technology, embrace digital assets? The answer likely lies somewhere in between, but the implications are profound. Catalyst for Other Industries: If Liminatus Pharma successfully navigates this investment, it could serve as a powerful case study, encouraging other healthcare companies, and indeed firms in diverse traditional sectors, to explore similar digital asset strategies. Increased Institutional Adoption: We‚Äôve seen tech companies and financial institutions enter the crypto space. Liminatus Pharma‚Äôs entry from the healthcare sector signifies a broadening of institutional interest, lending more legitimacy and stability to the crypto market. Evolution of Treasury Management: Corporate treasurers, traditionally conservative, may begin to view digital assets as a legitimate, albeit higher-risk, component of a diversified treasury portfolio. This could lead to new financial products and services tailored for corporate crypto holdings. Demand for Expertise: The need for skilled professionals in digital asset management, blockchain security, and crypto-specific regulatory compliance will surge, creating new career opportunities. While the path ahead for Liminatus Pharma‚Äôs BNB investment will undoubtedly have its twists and turns, their commitment represents a significant vote of confidence in the long-term viability and strategic value of digital assets for corporate growth and resilience. Conclusion: A Bold Step Towards a Digital Future Liminatus Pharma‚Äôs decision to launch a $500 million BNB investment through its American BNB Strategy subsidiary is more than just a financial transaction; it‚Äôs a strategic declaration. It underscores a growing conviction among established corporations that digital assets are not merely speculative tools but integral components of a modern, diversified financial strategy. This move by a Nasdaq-listed healthcare company could very well be a harbinger of things to come, challenging conventional wisdom and paving the way for broader corporate adoption of cryptocurrencies. As the digital landscape continues to evolve, Liminatus Pharma stands poised at the forefront, ready to navigate the opportunities and challenges of this exciting new frontier. Their journey will be closely watched, potentially setting a precedent for how traditional industries embrace the decentralized future. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is Liminatus Pharma‚Äôs plan for BNB? Liminatus Pharma plans to form a subsidiary, American BNB Strategy, to invest up to $500 million in BNB as part of a long-term digital asset strategy. The investment will be deployed in phases. Why did Liminatus Pharma choose BNB over other cryptocurrencies? Liminatus Pharma likely chose BNB due to its robust ecosystem (Binance Exchange, BNB Chain), diverse utility (paying fees, participating in sales), growing developer activity, and deflationary mechanisms (token burns) which can contribute to its long-term value. What is the ‚ÄúAmerican BNB Strategy‚Äù subsidiary? It is a new subsidiary formed by Liminatus Pharma specifically to raise and deploy the $500 million investment in BNB. Its purpose is to manage the digital asset strategy, isolate risk, focus expertise, and ensure compliance. What are the risks associated with this BNB investment? Key risks include high market volatility, evolving regulatory uncertainty, security vulnerabilities (hacks, theft), potential reputational concerns from traditional investors, and the operational complexities of managing a large crypto portfolio. How might this impact the broader corporate adoption of crypto? This significant investment by a non-tech, Nasdaq-listed company could serve as a powerful case study, encouraging other traditional industries to explore similar digital asset strategies, thereby accelerating institutional adoption of cryptocurrencies. Is this investment a sign of a new trend for healthcare companies? While it‚Äôs too early to call it a widespread trend, Liminatus Pharma‚Äôs move is a pioneering step for the healthcare sector. If successful, it could inspire other healthcare and traditional companies to consider cryptocurrencies as part of their long-term financial strategies. Did Liminatus Pharma‚Äôs bold move surprise you? Share your thoughts on this groundbreaking BNB investment and its implications for the future of corporate finance on social media! Let‚Äôs continue the conversation. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping institutional adoption and digital asset strategies . This post BNB Investment: Liminatus Pharma‚Äôs Revolutionary $500M Leap into Digital Assets first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: TRON Tops Ethereum in USDT Liquidity, Driving New Wave of Onchain Activity:CryptoQuant
body: TRON has taken the lead as the dominant network for USDT, overtaking Ethereum in both stablecoin liquidity and user transactions, according to a new report from CryptoQuant. Ethereum lost the stablecoin crown. TRON now leads in USDT supply, fees and daily transfers. Join our Space with @trondao on July 30, 10 AM PT to unpack how they pulled it off. Set your reminder https://t.co/Uz25njT1sW ‚Äî CryptoQuant.com (@cryptoquant_com) July 28, 2025 With a USDT supply now standing at $80.8 billion compared to Ethereum‚Äôs $73.8 billion, TRON has become the go-to blockchain for stablecoin transfers, marking a 35% rise since the beginning of 2025. USDT Activity Shifts to TRON TRON‚Äôs daily USDT transaction count ranges between 2.3 to 2.4 million‚Äîaround 6.8 times higher than Ethereum‚Äôs volume. On a value basis, the network processes over $24.6 billion in USDT per day, more than double that of its rival, reports CryptoQuant. The firm reports that in the first half of 2025, 98% of the top 10 token transfers on TRON were USDT-related, totaling 384 million transactions. This shift shows not just scale, but TRON‚Äôs growing reliability as the infrastructure of choice for dollar-pegged stablecoin transactions. Network Growth and Gasless Adoption May 2025 saw TRON process 273 million transactions, its second-highest monthly figure ever. June brought further traction with 28.7 million active addresses‚Äîthe most since mid-2023. Much of this growth is credited to TRON‚Äôs gasless transaction model, which now accounts for 75% of all activity on the network, up from 60% in late 2023. By removing entry costs, TRON continues to attract users looking for frictionless access to onchain services. DeFi Ecosystem Expands with SunSwap and JustLend TRON‚Äôs decentralized exchange, SunSwap, has also experienced consistent activity throughout 2025, maintaining swap volumes above $3 billion per month and peaking at $3.8 billion in May. The number of transactions per month also climbed, averaging 516,000‚Äîan increase from 316,000 in 2024. Although WTRX still leads swap volumes, its market share has dropped from 98% to 70%, indicating greater use of stablecoins and other assets across the platform. Lending protocol JustLend is also gaining momentum. Both deposits and borrowing volumes have increased, with USDT and USDD driving activity. Borrowing transactions alone have grown 23% compared to 2024 levels, underscoring a stronger appetite for stablecoin-backed DeFi lending. Fee Revenue Hits Record High Despite the surge in fee-free transactions, TRON‚Äôs fee revenue hit a new high of $308 million in June 2025. This reflects growing use of advanced, value-added services across the network, particularly in decentralized finance. The ability to scale gasless usage and earn higher network fees points to a maturing ecosystem with layered activity beyond simple transfers. TRON‚Äôs ascent highlights its role in shaping the next phase of stablecoin utility and onchain finance. With increased liquidity, higher transaction volume, and expanding DeFi services, the network is positioning itself as a long-term competitor in the global digital asset economy. Stablecoin Market Hits $252B The first half of 2025 marked a new phase for stablecoins , as their total market supply surged from $204 billion to $252 billion, with monthly settlement volumes reaching $1.39 trillion, CertiK reports. USDT continues to lead the market in liquidity, particularly on the Tron network, while USDC has narrowed the gap by securing a MiCA license, completing an IPO, and expanding its supply to $61 billion. The post TRON Tops Ethereum in USDT Liquidity, Driving New Wave of Onchain Activity:CryptoQuant appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Bitcoin Investment: Convano‚Äôs Bold $10.1M Move Shakes Up Corporate Strategy
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Investment: Convano‚Äôs Bold $10.1M Move Shakes Up Corporate Strategy In a world where digital assets are increasingly reshaping traditional finance, some of the most intriguing shifts are coming from unexpected corners. Imagine a Japan-based nail salon operator making headlines not for its latest beauty trends, but for its substantial Bitcoin investment . This is precisely the story of Convano, a company that has just secured 1.5 billion yen (approximately $10.1 million) specifically to bolster its holdings in the world‚Äôs leading cryptocurrency. This move, as reported by @btcNLNico on X, follows a prior acquisition of around 80 BTC last week, signaling a clear and deliberate pivot towards digital assets. For many, this raises questions: Why would a nail salon dive so deeply into Bitcoin investment ? And what does this tell us about the evolving landscape of corporate finance? Convano‚Äôs Strategic Bitcoin Investment: A Closer Look Convano‚Äôs decision to raise a significant sum for additional Bitcoin purchases isn‚Äôt just a fleeting interest; it appears to be a well-thought-out strategic play. The company, primarily known for its nail salon operations, is now positioning itself within the volatile yet potentially lucrative cryptocurrency market. This latest fundraising round, amounting to $10.1 million, is earmarked directly for increasing their Bitcoin reserves. This follows their initial venture into the Bitcoin space with the purchase of roughly 80 BTC just a week prior. Such swift and substantial action suggests Convano views Bitcoin investment not as a speculative gamble, but as a legitimate treasury management strategy or a long-term value play. It reflects a growing confidence, even among non-traditional tech companies, in Bitcoin‚Äôs potential as a store of value or a hedge against economic uncertainties. Why Are Companies Embracing Bitcoin Investment? Convano isn‚Äôt an isolated case, though its industry might make it seem so. A growing number of corporations worldwide are exploring or actively engaging in Bitcoin investment . But what drives this trend? Several factors contribute to this paradigm shift: Inflation Hedge: In an era of quantitative easing and rising inflation concerns, Bitcoin is often touted as ‚Äòdigital gold.‚Äô Its finite supply of 21 million coins makes it attractive to companies looking to preserve purchasing power against currency devaluation. Diversification of Treasury Reserves: Traditional corporate treasury strategies often involve holding cash, bonds, or other low-yield assets. Adding Bitcoin offers a new avenue for diversification, potentially enhancing overall portfolio returns, albeit with higher risk. Future-Proofing and Innovation: Companies investing in Bitcoin signal an embrace of emerging technologies and a forward-thinking approach. It can attract talent, appeal to tech-savvy customers, and position the company at the forefront of digital transformation. Potential for Significant Returns: Despite its volatility, Bitcoin has historically offered substantial returns over longer periods, far outperforming traditional assets. For companies with a higher risk tolerance and long-term vision, this potential upside is a major draw. Public Perception and Brand Image: For some, adopting Bitcoin can be a statement. It aligns the company with innovation and a decentralized future, potentially boosting brand appeal among certain demographics. Navigating the Challenges of Corporate Bitcoin Investment While the allure of Bitcoin investment is strong, it‚Äôs not without its complexities and risks. Companies venturing into this space must carefully consider several challenges: Price Volatility: Bitcoin‚Äôs price can experience dramatic swings in short periods. This volatility can impact a company‚Äôs balance sheet and quarterly earnings, making financial reporting more complex. Regulatory Uncertainty: The regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies is still evolving globally. Changes in laws or new regulations could significantly impact the value or usability of Bitcoin holdings. Security Risks: Holding large amounts of cryptocurrency requires robust security measures to protect against hacks, theft, or loss of private keys. This necessitates specialized expertise and infrastructure. Accounting and Tax Implications: The accounting treatment for cryptocurrencies can be intricate and varies by jurisdiction. Companies need clear guidance on how to report holdings, gains, and losses for tax purposes. Public Scrutiny: Investing in a volatile and relatively new asset class can draw scrutiny from shareholders, analysts, and the public, especially if the investment underperforms. Convano‚Äôs move highlights that even businesses outside the tech sector are weighing these risks against potential rewards, suggesting a growing institutional comfort level with digital assets. Beyond Convano: A Growing Trend in Bitcoin Investment Convano‚Äôs foray into Bitcoin is part of a broader trend of corporate adoption that has gained significant momentum over the past few years. Companies like MicroStrategy, led by Michael Saylor, have become pioneers, accumulating vast amounts of Bitcoin as their primary treasury reserve asset. Tesla, under Elon Musk, also famously added Bitcoin to its balance sheet, albeit with some subsequent adjustments. Even traditional financial institutions are now offering crypto services or holding Bitcoin directly. This growing list of diverse companies engaging in Bitcoin investment underscores a shift in how corporate treasuries are managed and how value is perceived in the digital age. It‚Äôs no longer just tech giants; small to medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) and even companies from non-tech sectors are beginning to see the strategic value. Consider the following examples of corporate Bitcoin investment strategies: Company Industry Primary Motivation for Bitcoin Investment MicroStrategy Business Intelligence Primary treasury reserve asset, inflation hedge Tesla Automotive, Clean Energy Diversification, innovation alignment Block (formerly Square) Financial Services, Payments Balance sheet diversification, support for crypto ecosystem Convano Nail Salons, Beauty Asset diversification, potential long-term value This table illustrates the varied motivations behind corporate Bitcoin investment , ranging from a core treasury strategy to a broader embrace of digital innovation. The Future of Corporate Bitcoin Investment: What Does Convano Signal? Convano‚Äôs latest fundraising for Bitcoin purchases is more than just a quirky news item; it‚Äôs a potent signal. It suggests that the appeal of Bitcoin investment is extending beyond the typical tech and finance sectors, permeating industries that might have once seemed entirely unrelated to digital assets. This diversification of corporate holders could lead to several significant outcomes: Increased Mainstream Acceptance: As more diverse companies hold Bitcoin, it normalizes the asset, making it more acceptable to a wider range of investors and the general public. Greater Liquidity and Stability: Increased corporate holding can contribute to deeper market liquidity and potentially reduce some of Bitcoin‚Äôs extreme volatility over time, as a larger portion of the supply is held by long-term strategic investors. Pressure on Traditional Finance: The success of companies like Convano in leveraging Bitcoin could put pressure on traditional financial institutions and advisors to offer more comprehensive digital asset solutions. New Business Models: Companies might start integrating Bitcoin into their core operations, not just as a treasury asset, but for payments, supply chain management, or loyalty programs. The nail salon‚Äôs bold step could inspire other small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) globally to consider similar strategies, further accelerating the adoption curve. Actionable Insights for Businesses and Investors For businesses contemplating a similar move, or for individual investors observing this trend, Convano‚Äôs story offers valuable insights: Do Your Due Diligence: Thoroughly research Bitcoin and the broader crypto market. Understand its technology, market dynamics, and historical performance. Assess Risk Tolerance: Determine if your company or personal portfolio can withstand Bitcoin‚Äôs inherent volatility. Start small if unsure. Consult Experts: Engage with financial advisors, tax professionals, and legal counsel who specialize in digital assets to navigate the complex regulatory and accounting landscape. Prioritize Security: If holding Bitcoin, invest in robust security solutions, whether it‚Äôs cold storage, multi-signature wallets, or working with reputable custodians. Long-Term Vision: Corporate Bitcoin investment is often a long-term play. Be prepared to weather market fluctuations and focus on the asset‚Äôs potential over years, not just weeks or months. Conclusion Convano‚Äôs latest $10.1 million raise for additional Bitcoin investment is far more than just a niche news story; it‚Äôs a powerful testament to the evolving perception of digital assets in the global economy. A nail salon operator‚Äôs strategic pivot towards Bitcoin underscores a growing trend where companies, regardless of their traditional industry, are recognizing the potential of cryptocurrencies as a significant component of modern treasury management and long-term value creation. While the path of corporate crypto adoption is fraught with challenges, including volatility and regulatory uncertainty, Convano‚Äôs bold move highlights a growing confidence and a willingness to innovate. This development serves as a compelling indicator that Bitcoin is steadily cementing its place not just as a speculative asset, but as a legitimate and increasingly mainstream part of corporate financial strategy. The future of corporate finance is undoubtedly becoming more digital, and Convano is painting a clear picture of that transformation, one Bitcoin purchase at a time. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: Why would a nail salon like Convano invest in Bitcoin? Convano‚Äôs Bitcoin investment is likely a strategic move for asset diversification and potential long-term value appreciation. Companies are increasingly viewing Bitcoin as a hedge against inflation and a way to future-proof their treasury reserves in a digitalizing economy, even if their core business is unrelated to technology. Q2: What are the main risks associated with corporate Bitcoin investment? Key risks include Bitcoin‚Äôs high price volatility, which can significantly impact a company‚Äôs balance sheet; regulatory uncertainty, as crypto laws are still evolving; and security challenges related to safeguarding digital assets from theft or loss. Q3: How does Convano‚Äôs Bitcoin purchase compare to other corporate investments? While the scale of Convano‚Äôs investment ($10.1 million) is smaller than giants like MicroStrategy or Tesla, its significance lies in the company‚Äôs non-tech industry background. It signals a broadening appeal of Bitcoin investment beyond traditional tech and finance sectors. Q4: Is Bitcoin investment a common strategy for Japanese companies? While specific data for all Japanese companies is not readily available, Convano‚Äôs move indicates a growing openness and interest in digital assets within Japan‚Äôs corporate sector. Japan has a relatively progressive stance on cryptocurrency regulation, which may encourage such investments. Q5: What should businesses consider before making a Bitcoin investment? Businesses should conduct thorough due diligence, assess their risk tolerance, consult with financial and legal experts specializing in crypto, prioritize robust security measures for their holdings, and adopt a long-term investment perspective to mitigate volatility risks. Q6: How does corporate Bitcoin investment impact the broader crypto market? Increased corporate Bitcoin investment can lead to greater mainstream acceptance, improved market liquidity, and potentially reduced volatility over the long term as more supply is held by strategic, long-term investors. It also pressures traditional finance to adapt to digital assets. If you found this article insightful, please consider sharing it with your network! Your support helps us continue to deliver crucial insights into the evolving world of cryptocurrency and corporate finance. To learn more about the latest Bitcoin investment trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin‚Äôs institutional adoption. This post Bitcoin Investment: Convano‚Äôs Bold $10.1M Move Shakes Up Corporate Strategy first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: India Collects ‚Çπ437 Crore in Crypto Taxes, Thanks to AI
body: The post India Collects ‚Çπ437 Crore in Crypto Taxes, Thanks to AI appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News India‚Äôs Income Tax Department is now using artificial intelligence (AI) and data tools to catch people trying to avoid paying taxes on cryptocurrencies. In a recent update to the Parliament, the government revealed that it has collected ‚Çπ437 crore in crypto taxes by using AI. In an interview with Economic Times, Ravi Agrawal, Chairman of the Central Board of Direct Taxes, said that India is using new technologies like machine learning and digital forensics to track suspicious crypto transactions more effectively. India Tax Authorities Use AI to Detect Tax Evasion The government admitted that tax authorities are using AI to match deducted at source (TDS) data submitted by crypto exchanges. It shows that India is strengthening its tax compliance measures, and as per the latest reports, the government received a total of Rs 437 crore as taxes on VDA-related income in the financial year 2022-2023 alone. Additionally, the government has also launched the Crypto-Asset Reporting Framework (CARF) to ensure automated sharing of tax-related information. ‚ÄúThe goal is to place crypto transactions under international tax agreements so there is alignment among the nations,‚Äù Saravanan Pandian, CEO and founder of KoinBX, said in an interview with Decrypt . With recent crypto regulations development in India, it is clear that the government is emphasizing transparency and accountability in the digital asset space. CA Sonu Jain, chief risk and compliance officer at 9Point Capital, also confirmed the fact that India is intensifying its measures to enhance transparency with new tools and technology. He said, ‚ÄúIndia is preparing for a future where wallet visibility and automatic data exchange become routine in an industry long plagued by anonymity.‚Äù Final Thought In 2025, the Indian government has taken several steps to develop its digital asset space; it has evolved‚Äî tax , transparency, consumer protection, asset reporting, and cross-border trading. Now, with the confirmation of AI utility in the tax department, the nation demonstrates its enhanced measures of traceability to curb crypto tax evasion.

title: Is HashKey Capital About to Dump $47M Worth of Ethereum?
body: The post Is HashKey Capital About to Dump $47M Worth of Ethereum? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Ethereum is showing signs of cooling off after a strong rally, slipping slightly from its recent highs near $3,900. While the broader crypto market remains resilient, a recent on-chain move has raised concerns among traders: a potential institutional sell-off could be underway. $47 Million ETH Transfer to OKX According to on-chain tracking platform Lookonchain , a wallet likely linked to HashKey Capital, a major crypto investment firm, transferred 12,000 ETH (worth approximately $47.18 million) to the OKX exchange just two hours ago. Such large transfers to centralized exchanges often indicate that the sender is preparing to sell, leading to speculation that HashKey may be taking profits after Ethereum‚Äôs recent price surge . Ethereum Rally at a Turning Point? This move comes just days before the U.S. Federal Reserve‚Äôs interest rate decision, a key macro event that could affect risk assets like crypto. Analysts suggest some institutions might be de-risking or locking in profits before potential market volatility. Ethereum had seen a solid breakout earlier this month, but whale activity like this often signals short-term corrections‚Äîespecially when markets are on edge ahead of macroeconomic catalysts. Ethereum Price Analysis Top crypto analyst Micha√´l van de Poppe also weighed in on Ethereum‚Äôs price action . He noted that although ETH recently broke out, the move lacked strong momentum. ‚ÄúI wouldn‚Äôt be surprised to see a short correction or a liquidity sweep before the next leg up,‚Äù he said . Van de Poppe believes the recent volatility can present opportunities for short-term traders, but might shake confidence among long-term holders. .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : Top 3 Altcoins, Which Will Rally This Week , Despite the sell-off fears, Ethereum remains technically strong: Current Price: $3,887 RSI: Neutral at 59.21 MACD: Slight bearish crossover Support Zones: Fair Value Gaps around $3,865‚Äì$3,870 Major Support: Holding above $3,800 critical level This suggests that while a short-term correction is possible, ETH remains in an uptrend unless $3,800 is broken decisively. Is This Just a Dip or Start of a Larger Move? Ethereum‚Äôs fundamentals remain strong, backed by institutional interest, upcoming developments in DeFi, and speculation around spot ETH ETFs. If macro conditions remain favorable, many analysts still expect ETH to retest $4,000 and higher in the coming weeks. However, with large players like HashKey potentially offloading holdings, short-term caution is warranted. title: Robert Kiyosaki warns of ‚Äòanother 1929 crash‚Äô and ‚ÄòGreat Depression‚Äô
body: Robert Kiyosaki , American businessman and educator, has sounded yet another financial alarm. In a recent social media post , the author of Rich Dad Poor Dad warned that the global economy could be on the brink of a collapse comparable to the 1929 crash and the Great Depression. Kiyosaki‚Äôs warning cites ballooning U.S. debt as the chief reason for concern and recommends, in his characteristic fashion, a shift toward assets such as gold , silver , and Bitcoin ( BTC ). ‚ÄúI sit tight with gold, silver, & Bitcoin. Good luck. We may be on the brink of another 1929 crash and another Great Depression. America‚Äôs debt is out of control. America is the worlds biggest debtor nation in history. You can only print money to pay your bills‚Ä¶.for so long.‚Äù DO YOU have a 401k or IRA filled with stocks? DO YOU know investment legends Warren Buffet and Jim Rogers have sold most if not all of their stocks and bonds? They are both in cash or silver. If you do not know why Buffet and Rogers have sold their stocks and bonds you may‚Ä¶ ‚Äî Robert Kiyosaki (@theRealKiyosaki) July 28, 2025 What is the future of Bitcoin? In the hours leading up to the post, the Bitcoin price dipped below the critical $119,000 mark. While the asset has somewhat rebounded since, some of the ongoing market developments could undermine its status as a hedge in the future. Nonetheless, Kiyosaki appears steadfast in his advocacy for ‚Äúdigital gold‚Äù, implying once again that the coin is a viable counterweight to fiat instability. His reasoning appears to follow that of veteran financiers like Warren Buffett and Jim Rogers, who have reportedly also increased their exposure to cash and precious metals. On July 25, Kiyosaki also noted the limitations of exchange-traded funds ( ETFs ), which he called ‚Äúpaper assets,‚Äù given their intrinsic lack of security that comes with tangible holdings like precious metals. ‚ÄúETFs make investing easier for the average investor‚Ä¶ so I do recommend them.‚Ä¶ Yet an ETF is like having a picture of a gun for personal defense.‚Äù The author‚Äôs most recent remarks thus reflect a long-standing skepticism toward traditional financial instruments. His strategy remains consistent: focus on accumulating tangible stores of value and non-fiat hedges. Featured image via Shutterstock The post Robert Kiyosaki warns of ‚Äòanother 1929 crash‚Äô and ‚ÄòGreat Depression‚Äô appeared first on Finbold .

title: Ethereum Founder Vitalik Buterin Highlighted the Two Most Important Goals for Ethereum! Here Are the Details
body: Ethereum founder Vitalik Buterin, in his response to the question ‚ÄúHow can we make Ethereum great again?‚Äù, highlighted two main goals: Widespread adoption and maintaining high security and decentralization. Vitalik Buterin: ‚ÄúSecurity and Adoption Are Essential to Making Ethereum Great Again‚Äù Buterin stated that three or four years ago, he didn't recommend DeFi (decentralized finance) platforms as a savings tool for ordinary users because the risk of losing principal was much higher than the potential return. However, Buterin emphasized that this has changed, and stated that current data is promising. According to Buterin, the DeFi ecosystem is becoming more secure. Indeed, the share of losses due to hacks in DeFi protocols as a percentage of the total value locked (TVL) has dropped below 0.53%. This indicates that the system is becoming more resilient and user-friendly than before. Buterin said that the Ethereum community should focus on maintaining these security gains while also increasing scalability and attracting more users to its network in the coming period, and that by achieving these two goals, Ethereum could be ‚Äúgreat again.‚Äù *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Ethereum Founder Vitalik Buterin Highlighted the Two Most Important Goals for Ethereum! Here Are the Details

title: Filecoin price prediction 2025-2031: What‚Äôs the future for FIL?
body: Key takeaways : Filecoin price predictions suggest an average market price of $2.97 in 2025. By 2028, the price is projected to reach $10.21. By 2031, FIL may reach $32.88 Filecoin is a decentralized storage network designed to securely and efficiently store humanity‚Äôs most important information. Launched by Protocol Labs in October 2020, it utilizes blockchain technology to create a peer-to-peer digital storage marketplace. Users can rent unused hard drive space to earn Filecoin tokens (FIL), the network‚Äôs native cryptocurrency. The system operates on a proof-of-replication and proof-of-spacetime consensus mechanism, ensuring that data is reliably stored over time and that storage providers hold the exact copies they claim. This approach incentivizes a robust and distributed network of storage providers, enhancing data retrieval speeds and security compared to traditional centralized servers. Filecoin aims to reduce the costs of storage services by leveraging the global surplus of storage capacity. As part of the broader Web3 ecosystem, it supports decentralized applications (dApps) and services requiring secure, decentralized data storage solutions, significantly advancing decentralized internet infrastructure.
